fields.name: Langfeyglade
fields.description: A once serene and hidden kingdom, known for its lush, enchanted forests and mystical creatures, is now on the brink of civil unrest. Ancient magic wanes, and factions vie for control over the remaining sources of magical power.

fields.name: Coralight
fields.description: A breathtaking city beneath the waves, built from living coral and bioluminescent plants, is threatened by external invasions and internal decay. Its inhabitants, a mix of merfolk, sentient sea creatures, and adapted surface dwellers, face a future uncertain.

fields.name: Aetheria's Reach
fields.description: A series of floating islands above a seemingly endless void, connected by bridges of light and ancient magic. The islands are a haven for air elementals, sky pirates, and adventurers seeking the thrill of the unknown.

fields.name: The Thornheart Syndicate
fields.description: An elusive and ruthless band of thieves and assassins who seek to exploit the kingdom's strife for their gain. They thrive in chaos, using the cover of unrest to steal magical artifacts and eliminate those who stand in their way.

fields.name: The Duskwood Enclave
fields.description: A faction of druids who have turned to dark magic, believing that the only way to restore the kingdom is through purging it with fire and shadow. They manipulate the natural order, summoning dangerous creatures and blighting the land.

fields.name: The Silent Crown
fields.description: A cabal of nobles and mages who conspire to overthrow the current monarchy. Using political manipulation and dark magic, they aim to place a puppet ruler on the throne, one who will serve their interests and grant them unfettered access to the kingdom's ancient magics.

fields.name: The Gilded Merchants
fields.description: A powerful coalition of fairy merchants who control much of the kingdom's commerce. While primarily interested in profit, their influence over trade routes and supplies makes them a powerful entity that can sway the tide of conflict with their decisions.

fields.name: The Twilight Harbingers
fields.description: A group of oracles and seers who claim neutrality, offering their prophetic services to all. They believe in the inevitability of fate and see the strife as a necessary part of the kingdom's evolution, guiding those who seek their wisdom.

fields.name: The Woven Kin
fields.description: A collective of craftsmen, artists, and enchanters dedicated to preserving the kingdom's cultural heritage. They remain neutral, focusing on their craft and the belief that beauty and art can heal the rifts tearing their society apart.

fields.name: The Verdant Shield
fields.description: A band of rangers and beastmasters who protect the kingdom's borders and wildlands. They are committed to defending the realm from external threats and aiding those displaced or harmed by the conflict.

fields.name: The Luminous Covenant
fields.description: A holy order of paladins and light-wielders who fight to preserve peace and justice in the kingdom. They offer sanctuary to refugees, battle dark forces, and work to mend the rifts between conflicting factions.

fields.name: The Crystalborne Alliance
fields.description: A circle of mages specializing in healing and protective magics. They focus on aiding the wounded and the weak, repairing damaged lands, and seeking peaceful resolutions to conflict. Their magic is a beacon of hope for many in these dark times.

fields.name: The Abyssal Reclaimers
fields.description: A fierce group of merfolk and sea monsters who believe the city should return to the wild, untamed chaos of the deep sea. They launch raids against the city's defenses, aiming to destroy the structures that keep it safe from the abyssal pressures and darkness.

fields.name: The Kraken's Brood
fields.description: Worshippers of a legendary kraken they believe sleeps beneath Coralight, the cult seeks to awaken it to cleanse the seas of all civilizations, including their own. They perform dark rituals and sacrifices in hidden grottos, hoping to bring about their god's return.

fields.name: The Coral Bleachers
fields.description: A band of pirates and rogue sea creatures who exploit the city's resources, poisoning the waters with strange alchemical substances that bleach the coral and weaken its magical defenses. They are motivated by greed, seeking treasures and ancient artifacts hidden within the city's vaults.

fields.name: The Glimmerscale Traders
fields.description: A network of traders and merchants dealing in rare goods, magical items, and information. They maintain neutrality, trading with anyone who can afford their prices. Their extensive network can be a valuable resource or a dangerous enemy, depending on how they are approached.

fields.name: The Tide Whisperers
fields.description: A conclave of scholars, historians, and mages dedicated to studying the mysteries of the deep and the origins of Coralight. They remain neutral in conflicts, offering knowledge and advice to those who seek it, regardless of their affiliations.

fields.name: The Deepcurrent Carvers
fields.description: Skilled craftsmen who shape coral and undersea materials into beautiful and functional items. They are respected for their skills and neutrality, focusing on their art and the preservation of undersea cultures through their work.

fields.name: The Serene Guard
fields.description: The city's main defense force, comprised of merfolk, sea elves, and allied creatures, dedicated to protecting Coralight from external threats and internal sabotage. They patrol the waters, enforce the law, and help maintain the peace.

fields.name: The Pearl Sentinels
fields.description: A guild of healers and clerics who harness the power of the sea to heal injuries, cure diseases, and protect against the dark magic that threatens the city. They offer their services freely to those in need, acting as a beacon of hope in troubled times.

fields.name: The Aquatic Alliance
fields.description: A council formed by representatives of different species and factions within Coralight, working to foster unity and cooperation among the city's diverse inhabitants. They mediate disputes, negotiate treaties, and organize joint efforts to improve life in and around the city.

fields.name: The Stormfury Raiders
fields.description: A notorious gang of sky pirates and rogue elementals that prey on the islands and airships of Aetheria's Reach. They harness storm magic to attack and plunder, sowing fear and chaos wherever they fly.

fields.name: The Void Cult
fields.description: A secretive cult that worships the void between the islands, believing in an ancient prophecy that foretells the end of Aetheria's Reach through its consumption by the abyss. They seek to hasten this apocalypse through dark rituals and sabotage.

fields.name: The Skybreaker Legion
fields.description: A mercenary force equipped with advanced weaponry and airships, funded by unknown benefactors. They aim to conquer the archipelago and establish a new order, using their military might to subjugate the islands one by one.

fields.name: The Windborne Guild
fields.description: An influential guild of traders and inventors who navigate the skies, dealing in rare artifacts, technology, and information. They maintain neutrality, their allegiance swaying with the wind to whoever offers the best price.

fields.name: The Celestine Scholars
fields.description: A society of scholars, mages, and researchers dedicated to uncovering the secrets of the archipelago and the magic that keeps it afloat. They are neutral, focused on their studies and willing to share knowledge with all who seek it.

fields.name: The Cloudweaver Collective
fields.description: A community of artists, builders, and creators who specialize in crafting from the clouds themselves, shaping them into living spaces, sculptures, and vessels. They value creativity over conflict, remaining neutral and dedicated to their craft.

fields.name: The Azure Sentinels
fields.description: A knightly order that patrols the skies, defending the archipelago's islands and inhabitants from threats. They are valorous and just, committed to safeguarding the peace and prosperity of Aetheria's Reach.

fields.name: The Zephyr Alliance
fields.description: A coalition of island leaders and influential figures working together to ensure the stability and unity of the archipelago. They facilitate communication and cooperation between islands, mediating conflicts and organizing collective defense efforts.

fields.name: The Lumina Healers
fields.description: A revered group of healers and light mages who use their powers to heal wounds, cure diseases, and dispel darkness. They travel across the archipelago, offering their services to all in need, spreading light and hope.

fields.name: Eirlys Silverwing
fields.description: Eirlys Silverwing is a graceful and cunning elven rogue who hails from the realm of Langfeyglade. She is known as the leader of The Thornheart Syndicate, a notorious thieves' guild that operates within the kingdom's borders. With her silver hair and piercing green eyes, Eirlys is a master at blending in with the shadows and using her quick reflexes to outmaneuver her enemies. She is as beautiful as she is deadly, making her a feared adversary to anyone who crosses her path.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, Eirlys can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature she hits with an attack if she has advantage on the attack roll or the target is within 5 feet of an ally of hers that isn’t incapacitated and she doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

abilities.Shadow Step: As an action, Eirlys can magically teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Charm Person: With a whisper and a wink, Eirlys can attempt to charm a humanoid within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Eirlys for 1 hour or until she or her allies do anything harmful to it. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Rhett Nightshade
fields.description: Rhett Nightshade is a charming and charismatic half-elf bard who calls Langfeyglade home. He is a member of The Thornheart Syndicate and serves as Eirlys' right-hand man. With his skillful music and persuasive words, Rhett excels in gathering information and manipulating others to do his bidding. He is also a skilled pickpocket, making him an invaluable asset to the thieves' guild.

actions.Rapier: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 psychic damage and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll. Can be used once per turn.

abilities.Charm Person: As an action, attempt to charm a humanoid within 30 ft. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or become charmed for 1 hour or until it takes damage. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Countercharm: As an action, use music or words to create a soothing effect for allies within 30 ft, granting advantage on saving throws against being frightened or charmed. Can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Expertise: Choose two skills in which you have proficiency. You gain expertise in those skills, doubling your proficiency bonus for any ability check using these skills.
abilities.Magical Secrets: Choose two spells from any class, and add them to your bard spell list. These spells must be of a level you can cast. Can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Kaida Stormblade
fields.description: Kaida Stormblade is a fierce and fearless human warrior from the kingdom of Langfeyglade. She is a member of The Thornheart Syndicate, and her strength and combat prowess make her a valuable addition to the thieves' guild. With her fiery red hair and piercing blue eyes, Kaida strikes fear into the hearts of her enemies. Her loyalty to Eirlys and the Syndicate is unwavering, making her a trusted ally and a formidable foe.

actions.Greatsword: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.
actions.Crossbow: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Storm Strike: Once per turn, when you hit with a melee weapon attack, you can add 1d6 lightning damage to the attack.
abilities.Indomitable: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do, you must use the new roll. You can use this feature twice per long rest.

fields.name: Darius Shadowfoot
fields.description: Darius Shadowfoot is a sly and cunning halfling rogue who resides in the turbulent kingdom of Langfeyglade. As a member of The Thornheart Syndicate, Darius uses his small stature and nimble fingers to steal valuable artifacts and evade capture. Despite his unassuming appearance, he is a force to be reckoned with, having survived countless heists and skirmishes. His loyalty lies with the Syndicate, but he is always on the lookout for opportunities to advance his own agenda.

actions.Dagger Attack: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Shortbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack. You don’t need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn’t incapacitated, and you don’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

abilities.Dagger of the Syndicate: This dagger, given to you by the Thornheart Syndicate, has a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls. Additionally, once per long rest, you can use your reaction to deflect an incoming attack, adding your Intelligence modifier to your AC for that attack.
abilities.Evasion: While you are wearing light armor, you can use your reaction to halve the damage of a Dexterity saving throw that you fail.
abilities.Cunning Action: As a bonus action, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
abilities.Shadow Step: As an action, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is in dim light or darkness, and you remain hidden until the end of your next turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Evangeline Moonwhisper
fields.description: Evangeline Moonwhisper is a mysterious and enigmatic tiefling sorceress with a strong connection to the magical forces of Langfeyglade. As a member of The Thornheart Syndicate, she uses her powerful spells and knowledge of the arcane to gain an edge in their pursuits. With her pale skin, red eyes, and long black hair, Evangeline stands out among the other members of the thieves' guild. She is fiercely loyal to Eirlys, and her alliance with The Thornheart Syndicate has only strengthened her own magical abilities.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Chaos Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 damage of a random type.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 60 ft. to an unoccupied space you can see. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Hypnotic Gaze: As an action, target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Enchanted Archer
fields.description: A skilled archer with keen eyesight, this character favors long-range combat and is able to manipulate enchanted arrows to hit their targets with unerring accuracy.

actions.Enchanted Arrow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage plus an extra 1d8 force damage.
actions.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 60 ft to an unoccupied space you can see. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Enchanted Sight: The character has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
abilities.true Shot: Once per day, the character can add 1d4 to their attack roll when using the Enchanted Arrow action.

fields.name: Shadowblade Assassin
fields.description: This stealthy assassin is able to blend seamlessly into the shadows and strike with deadly precision. Their blades have been infused with dark magic, allowing them to deliver potent attacks that drain the life force of their enemies.

actions.Dagger Slash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Shadow Strike: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 necrotic damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is in dim light or darkness. You then have advantage on the first melee attack you make before the end of the turn.
abilities.Shadow Cloak: As an action, you can become invisible for 1 minute or until you attack, cast a spell, or use an ability. You can use this ability once per short rest.
abilities.Dark Pact: As a member of the Shadowblade Assassins faction, you have made a dark pact with your blades. Your weapons deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage on a hit and you have resistance to necrotic damage. This ability can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Elysia Moonshadow
fields.description: Elysia is a silver-haired elf who radiates an air of calmness and serenity. As a powerful druid, she possesses a deep connection to nature and the shadows that surround it. Her eyes are a piercing green, and she carries herself with regal grace. Elysia's magic holds both light and dark elements, as she stands conflicted between her past as a member of the Duskwood Enclave and her desire for peace in Langfeyglade.

actions.Staff Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Call Lightning: As an action, summon a bolt of lightning to strike a target within 120 feet. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d10 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 25 feet to an unoccupied space that is in dim light or darkness. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Nature's Blessing: As an action, heal yourself or an ally within 30 feet by 2d6 + 4 hit points. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Thorne Blackwood
fields.description: Thorne is a half-elf with jet black hair and striking red eyes. He was once a member of the Duskwood Enclave but left when their methods became too extreme for even him to handle. Thorne now wanders the forests of Langfeyglade, using his magic to protect the innocent from both the enclaves and the dark creatures they have summoned. Though he may appear cold and distant, Thorne is fiercely protective of those he cares about.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Slice and Dice: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage and an extra 1d6 poison damage.

abilities.Hunter's Mark: As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see within 90 feet and mark it as your quarry. Your attacks against this creature deal an extra 1d6 damage. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Darkness: As an action, create a sphere of magical darkness that spreads out in a 15-foot radius from a point you can see within 60 feet. The darkness lasts for 10 minutes and can be dispelled with a successful DC 13 Wisdom check. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Misty Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Seraphine Nightingale
fields.description: Seraphine is a fairy with delicate wings and a mischievous glint in her emerald green eyes. She has been living in the Langfeyglade forest for centuries, absorbing the magic that surrounds her and honing her skills as a sorceress. She is quick-witted and playful, but also harbors a deep hatred for the Duskwood Enclave and their destructive ways. Seraphine uses her powers to disrupt their plans and protect the kingdom she calls home.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Chromatic Orb: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 3d8 damage of chosen type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder).

abilities.Fey Flight: As a bonus action, the sorceress can sprout wings and fly up to her movement speed. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Blink: As an action, the sorceress can teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space she can see. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Fey Resistance: The sorceress has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic cannot put her to sleep.
abilities.Nature's Blessing: The sorceress gains resistance to all non-magical damage while in the Langfeyglade forest.
abilities.Feywild Magic: Once per long rest, the sorceress can roll on the Wild Magic table and cast the resulting spell without expending a spell slot.
abilities.Shadowstep: The sorceress cannot use her Fey Flight or Blink abilities while within the Duskwood Enclave's territory.

fields.name: Asher Oakspear
fields.description: Asher is a human who has dedicated his life to studying and understanding the intricate web of magic in Langfeyglade. He is a powerful warlock, but unlike the Duskwood Enclave, he uses his abilities for good. Asher sees the potential for balance in magic and strongly opposes the enclaves' methods of controlling it. He is constantly on the move, gathering knowledge and allies to aid him in his quest for peace.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Shadow Blade: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 psychic damage.

abilities.Arcane Sight: As an action, you can see invisible creatures and objects within 10 feet of you for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Soul Pact: As a bonus action, you can regain a spell slot of your choice equal to or less than your warlock level. This feature can only be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Freya Shadowthorn
fields.description: Freya is a dark elf with long, silver hair and piercing yellow eyes. She is the leader of a secret faction of elves who have rejected the Duskwood Enclave and their destructive ideologies. Freya is a skilled assassin and strategist, using her team to disrupt the Enclave's plans from within. She keeps her true identity hidden, often posing as a member of the Duskwood Enclave to gather information and dismantle their schemes.

actions.Shadow Blade: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage. On a hit, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.
actions.Dagger Flurry: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage. If both attacks hit, the target takes an additional 1d4 poison damage.

abilities.Shadow Cloak: As a bonus action, you can enter a state of shadows, granting you advantage on all Dexterity checks and saving throws and reducing your movement speed by half. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Master Infiltrator: You have expertise in Stealth, Deception, and Sleight of Hand. Additionally, you can proficiently mimic any written document or handwriting you have seen.
abilities.Shadow Step: As an action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. You can use this feature once per long rest.
abilities.Misty Step: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. Usable twice per short rest.

fields.name: Enchanted Forest Nymph
fields.description: This nymph uses her ethereal beauty and enchanting powers to manipulate her enemies, leading them astray and controlling them at her will.

actions.Hypnotic Gaze: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute.
actions.Entangling Vines: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: The target is restrained until the end of its next turn. It can make a DC 13 Strength or Dexterity check as an action to escape.

abilities.Charm: As an action, the coven member can charm a creature within 30 ft for 1 hour. The target sees the coven member as a trusted friend and will do anything to protect them. This ability can only be used once per long rest.
abilities.Illusory Terrain: As an action, the coven member can create an illusory forest terrain within a 20 ft radius. Any creature entering the area must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or become disoriented and have disadvantage on all attacks.

fields.name: Shadowy Beastmaster
fields.description: A fierce druid who has turned to dark magic and uses it to summon powerful and terrifying creatures to do his bidding, leaving a trail of destruction in his wake.

actions.Summon Shadow Wolf: As an action, summon a shadow wolf with 25 HP and an AC of 13. The shadow wolf can make a claw attack dealing 1d6+2 necrotic damage.
actions.Conjure Poisonous Vines: As an action, conjure a 15 ft length of poisonous vines. Any creature within 5 ft of the vines must make a Constitution save or take 2d8 poison damage, half damage on a success. The vines remain for 1 minute or until destroyed. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Dark Empowerment: As a bonus action, the Shadowy Beastmaster can imbue a summoned creature with dark energy, increasing its attack damage by 1d6 and allowing it to make an additional claw attack as a bonus action. Usable once per turn.
abilities.Corrupt Nature: As an action, attempt to corrupt the natural terrain. Each creature within a 20 ft radius must make a Wisdom save or be charmed and fall under the control of the Shadowy Beastmaster. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the creature takes damage. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Sylvana Moonglade
fields.description: A graceful elf with long, silvery hair and piercing green eyes. She is skilled in both archery and magic, and her allegiance lies with the Langfeyglade faction, whom she believes can restore balance to the Fairy Kingdom. Sylvana is a natural leader, determined and wise beyond her years.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Entangle: As an action, create a grasping vine in a 20 ft. square. Each creature within the area must make a Strength saving throw or be restrained. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until broken. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Fey Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space you can see. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Nature's Wrath: As an action, you can call forth a storm of wind and rain in a 30 ft. radius. Each creature within must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Leading Presence: As a leader, you inspire your allies with your presence. As a bonus action, all friendly creatures within 10 ft. of you gain temporary hit points equal to your Druid level. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Finn Buckthorn
fields.description: A rugged dwarf with a bushy red beard and a mischievous twinkle in his eye. Finn is a skilled fighter, wielding a battle axe with ease. He is fiercely loyal to the Langfeyglade faction and their leader, seeing them as the rightful rulers of the Fairy Kingdom. Despite his gruff exterior, Finn has a kind heart and a sense of justice.

actions.Battle Axe: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Fairy Fire: As an action, Finn can call upon the power of the Fairy Kingdom to create a powerful burst of light. All enemies within a 15 ft. radius must make a Dexterity saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per day.
abilities.Second Wind: On his turn, Finn can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + his fighter level. Once he uses this feature, he must finish a short or long rest before using it again.
abilities.Battle Master's Precision Strike: As a bonus action, Finn can add a superiority die (d8) to the damage roll of his next attack and gain advantage on the attack roll. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Aurora Starlight
fields.description: A delicate fairy with shimmering wings and a gentle demeanor. Aurora is a powerful sorceress, able to harness the magic of the Langfeyglade forests. She is fiercely protective of her home and her people, and will do whatever it takes to defend them from the factions vying for control. Despite her small size, Aurora is a force to be reckoned with.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Hexblade's Curse: As a bonus action, choose one creature within 30 ft. that you can see. You gain a bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target equal to your proficiency bonus. If the target dies, you regain hit points equal to your Warlock level + Charisma modifier (minimum of 1).
actions.Shadow Blade: As an action, summon a blade of shadow in your hand. The blade counts as a magical weapon with a +4 bonus to attack and damage rolls. It deals 3d8 psychic damage on a hit. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Fey Flight: As a bonus action, your shimmering wings allow you to fly at a speed of 60 ft. for 1 minute. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short rest before you can use it again.
abilities.Mystic Shield: As a reaction, you can impose disadvantage on an attack roll that targets you. You must be able to see the attacker and be within 30 ft. of them. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Viktor Nightshade
fields.description: A mysterious human with dark hair and a steely gaze. Viktor is a skilled assassin, using shadow magic to move silently and strike swiftly. He is a member of The Silent Crown, using his abilities to further their goals of overthrowing the monarchy. Despite his allegiance, Viktor has his own agenda and is not to be underestimated.

actions.Shadow Blade: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage plus 1d6 necrotic damage.
actions.Silent Strike: Ranged Attack: +8 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 ft that is in dim light or darkness. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Shadow Veil: As an action, create a 15 ft radius of magical darkness around you. Any creature within the area has disadvantage on attacks against you. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Lysandra Moonwhisper
fields.description: A wise half-elf with silver streaks in her dark hair. Lysandra is a powerful druid, able to communicate with the creatures of Langfeyglade and bend nature to her will. She is a key member of the rebellion against The Silent Crown, using her knowledge of the land and its magic to thwart their plans. Lysandra is determined to restore peace to the Fairy Kingdom.

actions.Quarterstaff Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Thorn Whip: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 ft closer to the druid.

abilities.Call of the Wild: As an action, summon a pack of wolves to aid in battle. The wolves have statistics as listed in the Monster Manual and will obey the druid's commands for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Fey Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft to a unoccupied space you can see. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Illusionist Enchantress
fields.description: A charismatic spellcaster from the Silent Crown, skilled in trickery and manipulation. She uses her enchantments to sway political decisions in favor of her faction.

actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.
actions.Illusionary Image: As an action, create an illusion of an object or creature within 30 ft. The illusion can move and make sounds, but disappears if touched. Illusion can last up to 1 minute or until dismissed by the caster.

abilities.Charm Person: As an action, attempt to charm a humanoid within 30 ft. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the caster for 1 hour.
abilities.Misty Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space that you can see. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Shadowblade Assassin
fields.description: A ruthless killer trained in the dark arts of the Silent Crown. This agile and stealthy assassin is tasked with eliminating any potential threats to the faction's plans, often using their powers of illusion to deceive and confuse their targets.

actions.Shortsword Slash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+3 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, the assassin can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature it hits if it has advantage on the attack roll and meets other requirements.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, the assassin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see within dim light or darkness. This ability can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Illusory Disguise: As an action, the assassin can create an illusory appearance of themselves that lasts for one hour. It can change the appearance of its clothes, body, and any objects it is carrying, making it appears to be a different creature of the same size and shape. The illusion can physically interact with objects, but if it takes damage, the illusion is broken. This ability can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Seraphina Thornbriar
fields.description: Seraphina is the ambitious leader of the Gilded Merchants, known for her shrewd business acumen and ruthless tactics in expanding the consortium's influence. She is a fierce negotiator and will stop at nothing to increase profits and secure control over key resources, even at the expense of her competitors.

actions.Dagger Thrust: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 4d6 damage when you have advantage on the attack roll or if another enemy is within 5 feet of the target and is not incapacitated.

abilities.Deceptive Charm: As an action, make a Charisma check with advantage against a creature's Insight. On a success, the creature is charmed by you for 1 hour or until you or your allies attack it. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You must finish a short or long rest before using this feature again.

fields.name: Caspian Nightingale
fields.description: Caspian is a skilled enchanter and a rising star in the Gilded Merchants' ranks. His ability to imbue magical properties in their merchandise has greatly increased the demand for their goods, earning him favor with the leaders of the consortium. However, there are whispers of darker forces at work in his enchantments.

actions.Magic Missile: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 force damage.
actions.Enchanted Dagger: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed for 1 minute.

abilities.Fairy Dust: As a bonus action, scatter fairy dust in a 15 ft radius. All creatures in the area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Merchant's Favor: As an action, use your connections with the Gilded Merchants to gain an advantage on a persuasion check. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Alaric Silverleaf
fields.description: Alaric is a renowned tactician and the head of the Gilded Merchants' security forces. He is fiercely loyal to Seraphina and will stop at nothing to protect her and the consortium's interests. His past as a renowned knight has earned him respect and fear among potential adversaries.

actions.Greatsword Slash: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.

abilities.Helm of Command: As an action, Alaric can target two allies within 30 ft. Each ally can make one weapon attack or take the Help action as a bonus action on their next turn. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Fiendish Pact: Alaric has made a pact with a powerful fiend, granting him access to Warlock spells and abilities. He has 2 level 1 spell slots and 2 level 2 spell slots per long rest. Spells available: Hex, Armor of Agathys.

fields.name: Lysandra Briarwood
fields.description: Lysandra is a master thief and spy, always eager to gain information and secrets for the Gilded Merchants. Her natural grace and agility make her the perfect candidate for covert operations, and her proficiency with illusions and enchantments only add to her cunning abilities.

actions.Shortsword: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 3d6 damage to a creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll or if a creature is within 5 feet of the target and isn’t incapacitated.

abilities.Illusory Appearance: As an action, create a convincing illusion of yourself in a space within 30 feet that lasts for 1 minute or until you dismiss it. The illusion can move and speak and can mimic your actions, including combat actions, but it can't attack or deal damage. Enemies have disadvantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to see through the illusion. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Lullaby: As an action, sing a soothing lullaby that puts creatures within a 30-foot radius to sleep. Creatures that can hear the lullaby must make a Wisdom saving throw, falling asleep on a failed save. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or is woken up by a creature using an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Roland Blackthorn
fields.description: Roland is a burly, no-nonsense enforcer for the Gilded Merchants, tasked with collecting debts and punishing those who dare cross the consortium. Though some may see him as brute strength with little finesse, his unwavering loyalty to the Gilded Merchants has earned him a place in their inner circle.

actions.Warhammer Strike: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Intimidating Presence: As an action, choose one creature within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). On a failed save, the target is frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
abilities.Contract Enforcer: As a bonus action, you can use your warhammer strike on a target that is restrained, grappled or incapacitated. If the target fails the attack, they take an additional 2d8 bludgeoning damage.
abilities.Abjure Debt: Once per long rest, you can call in a debt from a creature you have intimidated, causing them to owe you a favor of your choosing.
abilities.Gilded Protection: Once per short rest, you can use an action to gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier, as your loyalty to the Gilded Merchants shields you from harm.

fields.name: Enchanted Archer
fields.description: A lithe figure with sparkling green eyes and long, flowing hair, this enchanted archer is known for their quick movements and pinpoint accuracy with a bow.

actions.Bow Strike: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Fairy Magic: As a bonus action, the enchanted archer can cast one of the following spells: Charm Person, Faerie Fire, or Sleep. The spell's level must be equal to or lower than the character's level. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Wind Step: As a bonus action, the enchanted archer can dash up to 30 ft without provoking opportunity attacks. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Fae's Blessing: As a reaction when an ally within 30 ft is hit by an attack, the enchanted archer can use their reaction to grant the ally a +2 bonus to their AC for that attack. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Elusive Rogue
fields.description: Cloaked in shadows and blending seamlessly into their surroundings, this rogue strikes from the shadows with deadly precision. Their loyalty lies with the highest bidder.

actions.Sneak Attack: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 piercing damage plus an additional 2d6 damage if the target is surprised or within 5 feet of an ally. This ability can only be used once per turn.
actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Cunning Action: As a bonus action, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

abilities.Invisibility: As an action, you can turn invisible for up to 1 minute. This ability can only be used once per long rest.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.

fields.name: Seraphina
fields.description: Seraphina is a fierce elf warrior with a strong sense of justice. She was a trusted member of the royal guard, but after witnessing her king's corruption, she has joined the Twilight Harbingers to help bring balance to the kingdom. With her skills in swordsmanship and bow mastery, she is a formidable opponent to anyone who threatens the safety of Langfeyglade.

actions.Longsword Slash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Longbow Shot: Ranged Attack: +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Hunter's Mark: As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see within 90 feet. The next time you hit it with a weapon attack, it takes an extra 1d6 damage. Usable once per turn.
abilities.Second Wind: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
abilities.Fey Stride: As an action, you can cast Misty Step without expending a spell slot. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Zenithar
fields.description: Zenithar is a sly and cunning gnome, known for his persuasive abilities and clever solutions to problems. He was once a renowned merchant in the fairy kingdom, but turned to a life of thievery after being betrayed by his business partners. As a member of the Twilight Harbingers, he puts his skills to use by gathering information and resources for the faction.

actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack with a finesse or ranged weapon if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or ranged weapon.

abilities.Shadow Step: As an action, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You also gain advantage on your next attack roll. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Lore Mastery: You have expertise in one Intelligence-based skill of your choice. You can also use your bonus action on your turn to gain proficiency in a skill you are not proficient in until the end of your next turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Ophelia
fields.description: Ophelia is a half-elf bard, using her charming personality and musical talent to gather followers for the Twilight Harbingers. She believes in the power of unity and uses her abilities to inspire those around her to fight for a greater cause. Despite her peaceful nature, she is not afraid to use her fighting skills when necessary.

actions.Dagger Slash: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and disadvantage on next attack roll.

abilities.Inspiring Performance: As an action, Ophelia can inspire allies within 60 ft, giving them advantage on their next attack roll or saving throw. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Charm Person: As an action, Ophelia can charm one humanoid within 30 ft. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Twilight's Melody: As an action, Ophelia can unleash a haunting tune that harms enemies within a 15 ft radius. Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 Constitution save or take 2d6 necrotic damage. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Lucius
fields.description: Lucius is a wise dragonborn who joined the Twilight Harbingers after being exiled from his clan for his unconventional beliefs. He is a powerful sorcerer, with a deep understanding of ancient magic and prophecies. He uses his vast knowledge to guide the faction and help them navigate through the ongoing strife in Langfeyglade.

actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.
actions.Thunderwave: 1st-level Evocation Spell: Casting Time: 1 action; Range: Self (15-foot cube); Components: V, S; Duration: Instantaneous; A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

abilities.Eldritch Sight: You can cast detect magic at will without expending a spell slot.
abilities.Sorcerous Resistance: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

fields.name: Nimue
fields.description: Nimue is a mysterious halfling druid, known for her close connection to nature and her powerful shape-shifting abilities. She has been living in the enchanted forests of Langfeyglade for centuries and has witnessed the decline of magic firsthand. She joined the Twilight Harbingers to protect her home and the creatures within it, using her powers to heal and defend.

actions.Quarterstaff Attack: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shillelagh: As an action, you can imbue your quarterstaff with nature's power. It becomes magical and gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls, and deals an additional 1d8 damage on hit. Usable once per long rest.
actions.Shapechange: As an action, you can magically assume the shape of a different creature. You can use this ability twice per day, and the transformation lasts for 1 hour. At 8th level, you can transform into creatures with a challenge rating of 2 or lower.

abilities.Nature's Blessing: As a bonus action, you call upon the power of nature to heal yourself or an ally within 30 feet. The target regains 1d6 hit points. Once per short rest.
abilities.Elemental Fury: As an action, you can unleash a blast of destructive elemental energy in a 15-foot cone. Make a Wisdom saving throw, taking 4d6 elemental damage on a failed save, or half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Wild Shape Mastery: You have advantage on attack rolls made as an animal form and two additional uses of Shapechange per day. Additionally, you can transform into creatures with a challenge rating of 3 or lower.

fields.name: Mystic Seer's Thunder Caller
fields.description: A powerful mystic with the ability to call forth thunderstorms and manipulate the elements. They are fiercely loyal to the Twilight Harbingers and use their powers to aid in their faction's goals.

actions.Thunder Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 2d6 lightning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be stunned for 1 round.
actions.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a 60 ft long, 10 ft wide line of strong wind. Each creature in the line must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you.

abilities.Lightning Strike: As an action, call forth a bolt of lightning from the sky to strike a single target. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 3d10 lightning damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Harbinger's Favor: As a bonus action, you can grant yourself or an ally within 30 ft 2d8 temporary hit points. Once per short rest.
abilities.Note: The abilities and spells listed above are flavored to fit the character's description, but are based on existing spells and abilities in the game.

fields.name: Shrouded Seer's Disciple
fields.description: A young apprentice to the Mystic Seer's, their potential and abilities still in the early stages of development. However, they possess a strong connection to the magical energies of Langfeyglade and are determined to master their powers under the guidance of their faction.

actions.Arcane Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 force damage.
actions.Mind Spike: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 psychic damage and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

abilities.Mystic Shield: As a reaction, the Mystic Shield can deflect any incoming attack, imposing disadvantage on the attack roll. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Mystic Projection: As an action, the Mystic Shield can create a duplicate of itself that lasts for 1 minute. The duplicate can move and take actions independently, but cannot use the Mystic Shield's abilities. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Elwin Mistwood
fields.description: Elwin is a young fairy from the Woven Kin faction. She has long, wavy brown hair, vibrant blue eyes and delicate features. She is a talented weaver and her enchanted tapestries are highly sought after by collectors. Despite the looming unrest in her kingdom, Elwin remains optimistic and dedicated to her craft.

actions.Enchanted Needle: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute.
actions.Fairy Dust: As an action, create a magical dust that can be thrown in a 10 ft. radius. Creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Fairy Flight: As a bonus action, Elwin can fly up to her movement speed.
abilities.Weaving Magic: Elwin can imbue her tapestries with magical properties, providing a +2 bonus to any ability checks or saving throws related to the tapestry's function. This bonus increases to +4 at level 10. Can only have one enchanted tapestry at a time. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Fairy's Blessing: Once per long rest, Elwin can cast the Sanctuary spell on herself or an ally without expending a spell slot. In addition, the range of this spell is doubled.

fields.name: Kaelen Oakleaf
fields.description: Kaelen is a fearless warrior from the Woven Kin faction. He has spiky blonde hair, emerald green eyes and a muscular build. His swordsmanship skills are unmatched and he is fiercely loyal to his faction. Kaelen's love for his craft, woodworking, is only overshadowed by his desire to protect his fellow artisans and the kingdom.

actions.Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Nature's Blessing: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 radiant damage and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

abilities.Forest Sprint: As a bonus action, increase your movement speed by 10 ft for one turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Woodland Resilience: As a reaction, add 2 to your AC against one attack. Usable once per turn.

fields.name: Sylva Silvermist
fields.description: Sylva is a wise enchantress from the Woven Kin faction. She has silver hair that glimmers in the sunlight, piercing aquamarine eyes and a calm demeanor. As one of the oldest members of the faction, Sylva has a deep understanding of the kingdom's history and uses her magic to preserve and restore ancient artifacts.

actions.Enchanting Ray: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 force damage.
actions.Fairy Dust: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 psychic damage and the target is charmed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

abilities.Ancient Knowledge: Sylva has a deep understanding of ancient artifacts and history. She has advantage on History checks related to the kingdom's past.
abilities.Fae Magic: Sylva can cast the following spells once per long rest without needing material components: Faerie Fire, Sleep, Charm Person. She can also cast these spells using spell slots from her Enchantress class.

fields.name: Thorne Nightshade
fields.description: Thorne is a mischievous trickster from the Woven Kin faction. He has short black hair, golden yellow eyes and a sly smile. His pranks may cause some chaos, but his magical abilities are also highly valued by the faction. Despite his playful nature, Thorne is fiercely loyal to his fellow artisans and will do whatever it takes to protect them.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+5 piercing damage.
actions.Magic Missile: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+3 force damage (three darts total).

abilities.Pixie Dust: As an action, Thorne can sprinkle pixie dust on an ally. The ally gains the effects of the Fly spell for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Disguise Self: As an action, Thorne can cast Disguise Self at will, without using a spell slot.
abilities.Silent Image: As an action, Thorne can create an illusory image within a 15 ft. cube. The image can be anything Thorne can imagine and lasts for 10 minutes. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Evangeline Willow
fields.description: Evangeline is a kind healer from the Woven Kin faction. She has long blonde hair, warm brown eyes and a gentle spirit. Her proficiency in herbalism and healing magic has saved many lives in the kingdom. Evangeline's compassion and empathy for others make her an invaluable member of the Woven Kin, and she is often the voice of reason during times of conflict.

actions.Mace: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Touch: As an action, Evangeline can heal a creature within 5 feet of her for 1d8 + her Wisdom modifier (3) + her Cleric level (6) hit points. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Emotional Healing: Evangeline can use her Channel Divinity to heal emotional wounds, removing one level of exhaustion from a creature within 10 feet of her. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Shadowblade Assassin
fields.description: A stealthy killer, adept at using shadows to their advantage.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Hidden Blade: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that is in dim light or darkness. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
abilities.Assassinate: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack, it takes an extra 2d6 damage. Usable once per combat.

fields.name: Fiery Spellweaver
fields.description: A powerful mage, harnessing the elements to protect their allies and defeat enemies.

actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.
actions.Ice Shards: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 cold damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or have their movement speed reduced by half until the end of their next turn.

abilities.Bolstering Flames: As a bonus action, you can choose an ally within 30 ft and give them resistance to fire damage until the end of your next turn. Usable three times per long rest.
abilities.Frost Armor: As an action, you can summon a layer of frost to protect yourself. This grants you an additional 5 AC until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Elowen Whisperwind
fields.description: Elowen is a fierce ranger of the Verdant Shield, with long golden hair and sharp features. She is skilled in archery and wielding dual daggers, and always has her faithful wolf companion by her side. Her unwavering devotion to protecting her kingdom has earned her the respect and admiration of her fellow rangers.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dual Daggers: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage + 1d4 poison damage (applied once per turn).

abilities.Hunter's Mark: As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see within 90 feet. The next time you hit it with a weapon attack, it deals an extra 1d6 damage. You can move this mark to a new target as a bonus action. Lasts for 1 hour or until the target dies.
abilities.Evasion: When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.
abilities.Lead type character: As a Lead type character, Elowen has the abilities and strength of a level 5 Ranger, making her just as capable as any other party member. Her keen senses and tracking abilities make her a valuable asset to any group. She is also skilled in ranged and melee combat, and with her companion wolf by her side, she is a formidable opponent. Her dedication and loyalty to the Verdant Shield further adds to her skills and abilities on the battlefield.

fields.name: Alistair Stagford
fields.description: Alistair is a seasoned ranger and veteran of many battles, sporting a rugged look and a gruff demeanor. He may seem unfriendly at first, but his years of experience have made him a valuable member of the squad. He is an expert tracker and can communicate with animals.

actions.Longbow Shot: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Dual Short Swords: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 slashing damage.

abilities.Animal Companion: Alistair has a loyal animal companion, a wolf named Ruby, who assists him in battles. Ruby has an AC of 14 and can attack for 1d6 piercing damage.
abilities.Primeval Awareness: Alistair can sense the presence of aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead within 1 mile of him or his animal companion. He can also communicate simple concepts to them.
abilities.Fury of the Wild: Once per long rest, Alistair can enter a state of intense focus and unleash a barrage of powerful attacks, gaining an additional attack on all of his turns for 1 minute.

fields.name: Liliana Thornbloom
fields.description: Liliana is a young ranger in training, with short brown hair and bright green eyes. She is quick and agile, able to easily navigate through the dense forests of Langfeyglade. Her training has also given her the ability to communicate with plants, allowing her to gather information and resources for the group.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Speak with Plants: As an action, you can communicate with plants within 30 feet of you for 10 minutes. During this time, you can ask the plants simple questions and receive information from them. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Favored Enemy (Humanoid): You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

fields.name: Finnegan Wildleaf
fields.description: Finnegan is the leader of the Verdant Shield, with thick brown hair and a commanding presence. He is a skilled strategist and diplomat, able to navigate the complex political landscape of the Fairy Kingdom. He also has a strong connection to nature and has the ability to heal with his hands.

actions.Quarterstaff Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Poison Spray: Range Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 poison damage.

abilities.Nature's Blessing: As an action, Finnegan can touch a creature and heal them for 1d8 + 5 hit points. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Wild Shape: As an action, Finnegan can transform into a wolf or a giant eagle for up to 5 hours. He retains his alignment, personality, and intelligence score in these forms.
abilities.Entangle: As an action, Finnegan creates a 20 ft square area of difficult terrain filled with grasping vines, which restrain any creatures within it. Targets can make a Strength save to avoid being restrained. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Kaelen Moonwhisper
fields.description: Kaelen is a member of the Verdant Shield with striking silver hair and piercing blue eyes. She is stoic and disciplined, with a fierce loyalty to her comrades. Her skills lie in both melee combat and spellcasting, making her a versatile and valuable asset to the group.

actions.Longsword: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 slashing damage.
actions.Mace: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Channel Divinity: As an action, you can channel divinity to turn undead. Each undead creature within 30 ft must make a Wisdom saving throw, and is destroyed if its CR is equal or less than your level. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Second Wind: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
abilities.Divine Favor: As a bonus action, you can imbue your weapon with divine energy, adding 1d4 radiant damage to each successful weapon attack. Lasts for 1 minute. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Verdant Ranger
fields.description: This ranger is a master of the bow and arrow, able to strike with impeccable precision from far away. They are known for their unwavering dedication to protecting the natural balance of the kingdom.

actions.Longbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 60 ft to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this ability once per short rest.
abilities.Ensnaring Strike: As a bonus action, the next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack before the spell ends, tendrils of vines wrap around its legs. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Nature's Wrath: Once per turn, when a creature within 5 ft of you hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to deal 1d8 piercing damage to the attacker. This damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 11th level, and 4d8 at 17th level.
abilities.Favored Enemy: You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them. At 6th level, you can always detect your favored enemies within 30 ft, even if they are invisible or disguised.
abilities.Wild Warden's Mark: As an action, you can mark a creature you can see within 30 ft as your quarry. The marked creature has disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and abilities, and you have advantage on attacks against it. The mark lasts until the creature dies or you dismiss it (no action required). Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

fields.name: Razorclaw Beastmaster
fields.description: This beastmaster is rarely seen without their pack of fierce and loyal dire wolves. They have a deep connection to nature and are skilled in taming and commanding creatures of all shapes and sizes.

actions.Dire Wolf Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Spear Thrust: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Beast Bond: As an action, the beastmaster can form a telepathic bond with one creature within 30 feet, gaining advantage on all Charisma checks made to interact with that creature. This bond lasts for 1 hour or until the beastmaster uses the feature again.
abilities.Pack Tactics: The beastmaster's dire wolves have advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the beastmaster's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
abilities.Volenfell Fury: As a bonus action, the beastmaster can call upon the ferocity of their faction, granting themselves and their dire wolves a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 minute.

fields.name: Arwyn
fields.description: Arwyn is the brave and dutiful leader of The Luminous Covenant. Her commitment to justice and protecting the innocent is unwavering, even in the midst of civil unrest. She wields the light of the gods in battle, radiating a fierce and holy power that inspires her allies and intimidates her enemies. Her long, silver hair glows with a divine light, and her shining armor is adorned with symbols of her devotion to her cause.

actions.Divine Smite: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 radiant damage.
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore 25 hit points, or divide the healing equally among multiple creatures. You must finish a long rest before using this feature again.
actions.Turn Undead: As an action, present your holy symbol and speak a prayer, causing undead within 30 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage. On a success, the creature is unaffected.

abilities.Bless: As a bonus action, you can bless up to three creatures within 30 feet, giving them a d4 to add to attacks and saving throws for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Aura of Protection: Starting at 6th level, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you gain a bonus to all saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.
abilities.Channel Divinity - Radiance of the Dawn: As an action, you present your holy symbol and call forth healing light that spreads outwards from you, restoring up to 30 hit points to creatures of your choice within 30 feet. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Selene
fields.description: Selene is a skilled healer and member of The Luminous Covenant. Her gentle nature and empathetic heart make her a trusted confidant and healer in the midst of chaos and conflict. She carries a holy staff that emits a warm light that can heal and restore her allies. Her silver hair is tied in a braid and adorned with wildflowers, and her bright eyes are always full of compassion and determination.

actions.Healing Staff: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 radiant damage and the target regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage, or half damage on a successful Dexterity saving throw.

abilities.Light's Blessing: As an action, Selene can bless up to 3 creatures within 30 ft. Each blessed creature regains 1d4 + 3 hit points at the start of their turn for the next minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Divine Shield: Selene can use her bonus action to create a shimmering shield of light around herself or an ally within 30 ft. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the start of Selene's next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Eirik
fields.description: Eirik is a fierce and devout paladin of The Luminous Covenant. He is dedicated to upholding the laws of the land and protecting the innocent, using his strength and holy magic to dispel evil and bring justice to the kingdom. He has dark skin and a muscular build, with striking blue eyes that seem to hold the power of the gods within them. His armor is a gleaming white, emblazoned with symbols of righteousness.

actions.Longsword: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, heal a creature for 30 hit points. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Smite: As a bonus action, expend a spell slot to add 2d8 radiant damage to a weapon attack against a creature. Usable once per turn.
abilities.Divine Sense: As an action, detect the presence of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet. Usable a number of times equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier per long rest.

fields.name: Rowan
fields.description: Rowan is the youngest member of The Luminous Covenant, but his bravery and determination outweigh his age. He has a natural gift for wielding magic, and his control over the element of light is impressive for his years. He fights alongside his comrades, using his spells to weaken and distract their enemies. His dark brown hair is often messy, and his bright green eyes hold an innocent curiosity for the world around him.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 lightning damage.
actions.Fireball: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 150 ft., area of effect 20 ft. radius. Hit: 2d6 fire damage. All creatures within the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take full damage, half damage on a success.

abilities.Dazzling Glow: As a bonus action, create a 10 ft radius of blinding light around yourself. Enemies within this radius must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Healing Light: As an action, heal yourself or a creature within 30 ft. by 2d8 hit points. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sorcerous Origin: The Lightwalker – You gain resistance to radiant damage and your spells that deal radiant damage ignore resistance or immunity. Additionally, you can teleport up to 60 ft. as a bonus action, leaving behind a small trail of light. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Adalyn
fields.description: Adalyn is the strategist and tactician of The Luminous Covenant. She is quick-thinking, perceptive, and always two steps ahead of their enemies. She works closely with Arwyn to devise battle plans and strategies to outmaneuver their opponents. Despite her quiet and reserved nature, she is not afraid to stand up for what she believes in and fight for the greater good. Her blonde hair is pulled back in a neat ponytail, and her piercing blue eyes seem to hide a wealth of knowledge and wisdom.

actions.Longsword Slash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Block: As a reaction, gain a +2 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

abilities.Battle Tactics: As a bonus action, you can grant yourself or an ally within 30 ft advantage on their next attack roll. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Tactical Retreat: As a reaction, you can move up to half your speed away from an enemy that moves within 5 ft of you. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Guardian Dwarf
fields.description: A tall and strong dwarf, bearing a shield with the emblem of the Luminous Covenant. He stands ready to protect his allies and strike down any enemies who threaten the kingdom.

actions.Dwarven Maul: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Stone's Endurance: As a reaction, reduce damage taken by 1d12 + Constitution modifier.
abilities.Second Wind: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
abilities.Luminous Shield: As a bonus action, create a blinding light in a 10 ft radius around the character. Any enemy within the radius must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Seraphic Cleric
fields.description: An angelic being with radiant wings, wielding a holy mace and adorned in shining armor. She channels the power of her deity to smite evil and heal the wounded.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Radiant Smite: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 radiant damage.

abilities.Divine Grace: As a bonus action, the cleric can choose one creature within 30ft to heal for 2d8 + Wisdom modifier hit points. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Blessing of Light: The cleric can cast Bless as a 2nd level spell once per day. The affected creatures gain an additional +2 to attacks and saving throws while the spell is active.

fields.name: Nymriel Silverwind
fields.description: Nymriel Silverwind is a kind and compassionate eladrin, with long golden hair and piercing blue eyes. She is a powerful mage and a leader of the Crystalborne Alliance, dedicated to using her magic to heal and protect those in need. She is well-respected and beloved by her allies, and feared by her enemies.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Ice Knife: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 piercing damage plus 2d6 cold damage. The target and any creatures within 5 ft. of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.

abilities.Healing Light: As an action, Nymriel can heal an ally within 30 ft. for 1d8 + her Charisma modifier (minimum of 1). Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Misty Step: As a bonus action, Nymriel can teleport up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space she can see. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Felorin Lightweaver
fields.description: Felorin Lightweaver is a wise and experienced high elf, with long grey hair and a calm demeanor. He is a skilled mage and a member of the Crystalborne Alliance, renowned for his healing abilities and his strong sense of justice. He is often sought out for his wise counsel and diplomatic skills.

actions.Mace Attack: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Light: As an action, heal one creature within 60 feet for 2d8 + Wisdom modifier. Can be used 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Divine Guidance: As a bonus action, add 1d4 to a creature's attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. Can be used 3 times per long rest.

fields.name: Thalwyn Swiftwood
fields.description: Thalwyn Swiftwood is a skilled and agile wood elf, with short brown hair and emerald green eyes. She is a fierce warrior and a member of the Crystalborne Alliance, using her speed and archery skills to defend her allies and protect the innocent. Her bravery and determination are an inspiration to many.

actions.Longbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Dual Short Swords: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 slashing damage.

abilities.Nature's Fury: As a bonus action, Thalwyn can channel her connection to nature to imbue her weapon with elemental energy. For her next attack, she deals an additional 1d6 damage of a randomly determined element (fire, cold, or lightning). Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Evasion: Thalwyn is a skilled dodger, allowing her to use her reaction to halve any damage she takes from a Dexterity saving throw. Usable once per round.

fields.name: Galadriel Starlight
fields.description: Galadriel Starlight is a graceful and elegant half-elf, with long silver hair and a gentle smile. She is a talented healer and a member of the Crystalborne Alliance, using her healing magic to mend wounds and soothe pain. She is known for her patience and her ability to bring peace to even the most tense situations.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Touch: As a bonus action, heal a creature within 5 ft of you for 1d8 + 3 hit points. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Divine Shield: As a reaction, impose disadvantage on an attack against you or an ally within 5 ft. Usable once per long rest.
