abilities.Blessing of the Crystalborne: As an action, you can touch a willing creature and grant them 10 temporary hit points. These hit points last for 1 hour or until used. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Talon Swiftstrike
fields.description: Talon Swiftstrike is a fierce and determined dragonborn, with dark red scales and piercing yellow eyes. He is a powerful fighter and a member of the Crystalborne Alliance, using his strength and fire breath to protect his allies and defeat their enemies. His loyalty and dedication to his comrades know no bounds.

actions.Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Breath Weapon: Cone of fire breath with a range of 15 ft. Hit: 3d6 fire damage. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Crystalborn Fire: As a bonus action, the character's melee attacks deal an additional 1d6 fire damage for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Dragon Fear: As an action, the character can unleash a terrifying roar. Each creature in a 30 ft radius must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Healing Guardian
fields.description: An imposing figure, adorned with glowing runes and wielding a mighty staff of white oak. His magic is solely focused on healing and protecting his allies.

actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.
actions.Mace Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.

abilities.Healing Light: As a bonus action, you can heal a creature within 60 ft for 2d8 + your Wisdom modifier. Can be used a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once). Regains all uses on a long rest.
abilities.Channel Divinity: You can use your Channel Divinity to turn undead, as per the rules in the Player's Handbook, pg. 59. Can be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Enchanted Archer
fields.description: A graceful elf, dressed in shimmering green robes and wielding a bow made from the finest fairy wood. Her arrows are imbued with healing and restorative magic, making her a valuable asset in battle.

actions.Longbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Enchanted Arrow: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage and the target regains 1d6 hit points.

abilities.Fae Warding: As an action, create a magical barrier around yourself and your allies within 10 ft. Each creature in the barrier gains resistance to all damage types for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Healing Light: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to heal an ally within 30 ft. The ally regains 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier hit points. Usable three times per long rest.

fields.name: Nuriel
fields.description: As the leader of the Abyssal Reclaimers, Nuriel is an imposing merfolk with dark blue skin and sharp teeth protruding from their mouth. They believe in the power of the chaotic abyss and seek to destroy the structures of Coralight to return the city to its natural state. Nuriel is known for their cunning tactics and formidable combat skills, and they will stop at nothing to see their vision for the city realized.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Chaos Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 2d6 damage of a random damage type.

abilities.Abyssal Corruption: As an action, you can cause black, inky tendrils to erupt from the ground in a 20 ft radius around you. Each creature within the radius must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 necrotic damage and be restrained until the end of their next turn. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Dark One's Blessing: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level (minimum of 1). You can only use this once per short or long rest.
abilities.Pact Boon - Blade Pact: Your patron has granted you a magical weapon, which you can summon as a bonus action. It counts as a pact weapon that has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls and deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage on a hit. You can dismiss the weapon as an action, and it disappears if it is more than 5 feet away from you for 1 minute or more. You can also transform one magic weapon into your pact weapon by performing a special ritual while you hold the weapon. The ritual takes 1 hour to perform, and it replaces the magic weapon’s current magic with your pact weapon’s magic.

fields.name: Kaela
fields.description: Kaela is a sea druid who has joined forces with the Abyssal Reclaimers in hopes of bringing balance back to the underwater world. With long, flowing hair made of seaweed and a staff in hand, she is a formidable force in battle. Kaela is passionate about protecting the creatures of the ocean and will use her powers to heal and defend them during raids against Coralight.

actions.Quarterstaff Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shillelagh: As an action, touch a wooden weapon and imbue it with nature's power. The weapon becomes magical and its attack and damage rolls are based on your Wisdom modifier. This lasts for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Healing Surge: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier in hit points. You can also use this ability on yourself. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Call of the Sea: As an action, you can summon a swarm of sea creatures to attack your enemies. All enemies within 10 feet of a designated point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take 2d6 piercing damage and an additional 1d6 poison damage on a successful save. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Gromm
fields.description: Gromm is a monstrous sea creature, a powerful servant of the Abyssal Reclaimers. His immense size and strength make him a formidable opponent, and his loyalty to Nuriel is unwavering. Gromm's deep red scales and sharp claws strike fear into the hearts of those who dare to stand against him and the warband.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Tentacle Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be grappled by Gromm's tentacle.

abilities.Eldritch Armor: As a bonus action, Gromm conjures spectral armor made of dark energy, increasing his AC by 2 for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Sea's Fury: Once per short rest, Gromm summon a raging storm around him, causing lightning bolts to strike all enemies within 15 feet. Each creature must make a Dexterity save, taking 2d6 lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful save.

fields.name: Maya
fields.description: Maya is a surface dweller who has joined the Abyssal Reclaimers out of a sense of duty and adventure. Her agility and quick thinking make her a valuable member of the warband, able to navigate through the underwater city with ease and assist in raids against Coralight's defenses. Maya's determination and bravery have earned her the respect of her fellow Reclaimers.

actions.Dagger Toss: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 3d6 damage when you have advantage on the attack roll or if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it.

abilities.Deep Dive: As an action, Maya can hold her breath for an additional 15 minutes and swim at her full movement speed for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: As a reaction, Maya can halve the damage of an incoming attack. Usable once per short or long rest.
abilities.Call to Arms: Once per day, Maya can summon 2d4 Abyssal Reclaimers to fight alongside her for 1 hour.
abilities.Raiding Tactics: Maya gains advantage on all attack rolls and ability checks during a raid against Coralight's defenses.

fields.name: Nix
fields.description: Nix is a mischievous selkie who has found a home among the Abyssal Reclaimers. With their shapeshifting abilities and quick wit, Nix is able to infiltrate Coralight and gather important information for the warband. Despite their playful nature, Nix is a fierce combatant and will do whatever it takes to defend their home and family in the warband.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, when Nix hits a creature with an attack and has advantage on the attack roll, Nix can deal an extra 3d6 damage to the creature.

abilities.Shape Shift: As an action, Nix can transform into a seal or back into their true form. While in seal form, Nix gains resistance to cold damage and can hold their breath for up to 15 minutes. This ability can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Evasion: Nix can use their reaction to take no damage from an area of effect spell or from a successful Dexterity saving throw. This ability refreshes after a short or long rest.

fields.name: Coral Defender
fields.description: This merfolk has adapted to the underwater city's defenses, using their speed, agility, and trident to swiftly neutralize any threats to the city.

actions.Trident Stab: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 1d6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack.
actions.Cunning Action: As a bonus action, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

abilities.Ink Cloud: As an action, release a cloud of ink in a 15 ft radius centered on yourself. The area becomes heavily obscured for 1 minute or until a moderate or stronger current disperses it. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Aquatic Adaptation: You can breathe underwater and gain a swim speed equal to your movement speed.

fields.name: Bioluminescent Scout
fields.description: This sentient sea creature is an expert at navigating the dark depths of the ocean, using their bioluminescent abilities to guide and protect the city's inhabitants from lurking dangers.

actions.Bioluminescent Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage plus 3d6 radiant damage.
actions.Bioluminescent Barrier: As a reaction, the Bioluminescent Scout can create a protective barrier of light around themselves, increasing their AC by 2 until the start of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Deep Sea Vision: The Bioluminescent Scout can see in the dark and through magical darkness up to 120 feet.
abilities.Underwater Navigation: The Bioluminescent Scout is an expert at navigating underwater environments and can never become lost in the ocean.
abilities.Bioluminescent Flare: As an action, the Bioluminescent Scout can create a bright flash of light in a 20 foot radius, causing all creatures within the area to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they are blinded for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Thalassia
fields.description: Known as the Queen of Coralight, Thalassia is a merfolk, her shimmering blue hair a sign of her royal lineage. She is a fierce leader, determined to protect her city and its inhabitants at all costs. Her bond with the sea creatures is unmatched, allowing her to communicate and control them in times of need.

actions.Trident Strike: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Aqua Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 cold damage and the target must make a Constitution saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute. This ability can be used twice per long rest.

abilities.Call of the Sea: As an action, Thalassia can summon and control up to 3 sea creatures within 60 ft of her. They will obey her commands for 1 hour. This ability can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Royal Presence: All allies within 30 ft of Thalassia gain a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 hour. This ability can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Xander
fields.description: Xander is a unique mix of merfolk and surface dweller. His pale skin and dark blue eyes stand out in contrast to those around him, earning him the nickname "the Outcast" among his people. He is a skilled fighter, a master of wielding his trademark twin tridents. Xander has a rebellious streak, always questioning tradition and authority.

actions.Twin Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Dual Wield Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or ranged weapon.

abilities.Mystic Shroud: As an action, Xander surrounds himself in a shroud of mystical energy, granting him resistance to all damage except force damage for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Deception: Xander is proficient in the Deception skill, allowing him to use his charisma to deceive and manipulate others.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: When an attacker you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Neptuna
fields.description: Neptuna is a beautiful and seductive siren, luring sailors to their doom with her enchanting melodies. She is a master manipulator, using her powers to control others and get what she wants. However, deep down, she fears the Kraken's Brood and their twisted ways, and is torn between loyalty to her faction and her own survival.

actions.Siren's Song: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 psychic damage and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or become charmed by Neptuna for 1 minute or until they take damage.
actions.Enthrall: As an action, target one creature within 60 feet and force them to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is charmed by Neptuna for 1 hour or until she or any of her allies attack the target. The charmed creature will do anything for Neptuna's faction, even risking their life, but will not take actions that would result in immediate harm to themselves.

abilities.Song of Rest: When Neptuna or any friendly creatures who can hear her performance during a short rest can regain an extra 1d6 hit points. This increases to 1d8 at 9th level and 1d10 at 13th level.
abilities.Enticing Melody: Once per short rest, Neptuna can use this ability to charm one creature within 30 feet. The charmed creature is compelled to give Neptuna one useful item or piece of information. This charm lasts until the creature takes any damage or the end of Neptuna's next turn.

fields.name: Dorin
fields.description: Dorin is a sentient giant octopus, the unofficial guardian of Coralight. Despite her fearsome appearance, she is gentle and kind-hearted, using her strength and intelligence to protect the city from external threats. She has a deep bond with Thalassia, often acting as her confidant and advisor.

actions.Tentacle Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Ink Spray: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, range 15 ft. line, one target. Hit: Target is blinded for 1 minute, can repeat saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end the effect.

abilities.Protective Barrier: As a reaction, use your body to shield an adjacent ally from an attack, granting them +2 AC until the start of your next turn. Usable twice per long rest.
abilities.Water Form: As an action, you can transform into water for 1 minute, allowing you to move through small cracks and crevices unimpaired. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Deep Telepathy: You can telepathically communicate with any creature that has a language within 60 ft. Once per short rest, you can attempt to telepathically persuade a creature within 30 ft to take a specific action or to reveal information. This creature must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). On a failure, it follows your command for 1 hour or until your concentration is broken. On a success, it becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours.
abilities.Undersea Adaptation: You can breathe underwater and gain a swim speed of 60 ft.
abilities.Blessing of the Ocean: You have advantage on saving throws against being grappled, restrained, or knocked prone.
abilities.Trained Guardian: You gain proficiency in the Perception and Insight skills.
abilities.Deep Bond: Once per long rest, you can call upon the power of your deep bond with Thalassia to regain 1d6 hit points.

fields.name: Aria
fields.description: Aria is a surface dweller, one of the few who was accepted into Coralight. Her bright red hair and blue eyes make her stand out among the otherwise ocean-colored inhabitants. She is a skilled alchemist, creating potions that allow her to breathe underwater and communicate with sea creatures. Aria is fiercely loyal to Thalassia and the city, and will do anything to prove her worth to her new home.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage.
actions.Acid Blast: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 acid damage.

abilities.Potion of Water Breathing: As an action, consume a potion to be able to breathe underwater for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Potion of Animal Communication: As an action, consume a potion to be able to communicate telepathically with sea creatures for 10 minutes. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Create Elemental Blast: As a bonus action, create a blast of elemental energy (acid, fire, or lightning) within 30 ft. All creatures in a 10 ft. radius must make a Dexterity save or take 2d8 damage of the chosen element, half damage on a success. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Coral Guardian
fields.description: A powerful merfolk warrior, adorned with glowing coral armor and wielding a trident crackling with lightning. They fiercely protect the city of Coralight and its inhabitants from all threats, both from outside and within.

actions.Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the Coral Guardian.
actions.Coral Bash: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.

abilities.Coral Barrier: As a reaction, the Coral Guardian can create a barrier of coral around themselves, providing +2 AC until the beginning of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Call Lightning: As an action, the Coral Guardian can call forth a bolt of lightning to strike a target within 120 feet. Target takes 3d10 lightning damage and must make a Dexterity save or be stunned until the beginning of their next turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Kraken Follower
fields.description: A twisted and deranged cultist, their devotion to the Kraken's Brood is apparent in their crazed eyes and adorned ritual garb. They wield a wickedly sharp dagger, imbued with dark magic, and are willing to do anything to further their cause.

actions.Dagger Strike: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 piercing damage.
actions.Enslaving Whispers: As an action, the cultist targets one creature within 30 ft that can hear them. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the cultist for 1 hour. The charmed target will obey the cultist's commands. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Dark Sacrifice: As a bonus action, the cultist can choose to deal damage to themselves equal to half their current HP (rounded down) to give themselves an advantage on their next attack roll or saving throw. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sacrificial Offering: Once per long rest, the cultist can sacrifice a willing humanoid within 5 ft to the Kraken, granting themselves and their allies within 10 ft temporary hit points equal to the sacrificed creature's hit points. This sacrifice must be performed during a ritual, taking 1 hour and requiring a blood offering to the Kraken. These temporary hit points last for 1 hour or until depleted.

fields.name: Jett Blade
fields.description: Jett is a fierce and cunning human pirate, with sharp features and a dark tan that reflects years of a life spent under the sun. He wears a bandana around his head, a black leather coat adorned with skulls and a menacing sword at his side. Jett leads the Coral Bleachers with an iron fist, commanding their loyalty and instilling fear in their enemies.

actions.Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Pistol Shot: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 piercing damage.

abilities.Intimidation: As an action, make a Charisma check contested by a target's Wisdom or Charisma (their choice). If you win, the target is frightened for 1 minute or until it takes damage.
abilities.Sea Shanty: As an action, Jett sings a hypnotic song, forcing all creatures within 30 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 14, +2 for each additional creature). On a failed save, the creatures are charmed for 1 minute and Jett can issue a command to them telepathically.
abilities.Leadership Presence: As a bonus action, Jett can grant one ally within 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll.
abilities.Daring Escape: Once per long rest, Jett can use his action to disengage and double his movement speed.

fields.name: Coral Tidecaller
fields.description: Coral is a merfolk warlock, with shimmering scales and piercing green eyes. She uses her enchanting voice and dark powers to manipulate and control her enemies, while protecting the city from invaders. Coral is a leader within the Coralight community, and her allegiance to the Coral Bleachers is a secret she will take to her grave.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 120 ft range, one target. Hit: 1d10 + 4 force damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60ft range, one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and the target has disadvantage on their next attack roll.

abilities.Coral Bark Armor: As an action, summon a suit of armor made of coral that gives a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to cold damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Siren's Song: As an action, charm one creature within 60 ft. The creature must make a Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Dark Pact: Once per long rest, as a bonus action, gain temporary hit points equal to your warlock level + your Charisma modifier.
abilities.Invocations: Agonizing Blast, Mask of Many Faces.

fields.name: Keigan Frost
fields.description: Keigan is a halfling rogue, with a mischievous smile and a quick wit. He joined the Coral Bleachers for the thrill of adventure and the riches that come with it. He is skilled in sneaking, stealing, and charming his way out of any situation. Keigan is a trusted member of the gang, but is always on the lookout for a better opportunity.

actions.Shortsword: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Crossbow: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature you hit with an attack, if you have advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of an ally that isn't incapacitated.
abilities.Evasion: When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.
abilities.Cunning Action: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
abilities.Thieves' Cant: You can speak, read, and write Thieves' Cant, a secret language known only to those in your criminal organization.
abilities.Keigan's Charm: As an action, you can attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13). If it fails, the target is charmed by you for 1 hour or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The charmed target will do its best to help you and avoid any conflicts. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

fields.name: Sapphire Fin
fields.description: Sapphire is a sentient sea creature, resembling a beautiful mermaid with blue scales and a long shimmering fin. She is a skilled sorceress, using her powers to protect the city and its inhabitants from harm. Sapphire is fiercely loyal to Coral and the Coralight community, but her patience with the corrupt Coral Bleachers is running thin.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Chaos Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 damage, and roll a d8 to determine the type of damage (1 acid, 2 cold, 3 fire, 4 force, 5 lightning, 6 poison, 7 psychic, 8 thunder).

abilities.Water Whip: As an action, create a whip made of water that can strike a target within 10 ft. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage. Usable twice per short rest.
abilities.Siren's Song: Once per long rest, use an action to sing a haunting melody that can charm creatures within 30 ft. The affected creature must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13) or be charmed for 1 minute. The charm breaks if the charmed creature takes any damage.

fields.name: Atlas Oceanhorn
fields.description: Atlas is a half-elf bard, with long blonde hair and a charming smile. He joined the Coral Bleachers for the adventure and the promise of riches, but quickly realized the corruption and greed within the gang. He uses his musical talents to entertain and distract enemies, while secretly plotting to overthrow Jett and bring justice to Coralight.

actions.Rapier Stab: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and the target has disadvantage on their next attack roll.

abilities.Song of Rest: During a short rest, you can use soothing music or oration to help revitalize your companions. Each of your companions who can hear your performance regain an extra 1d6 hit points.
abilities.Whispers of the Damned: Using your bardic inspiration, you can invoke whispers of dark energy to disorient and confuse your enemies. Choose a creature within 30 feet, they must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13) or take 2d6 psychic damage and have disadvantage on their next ability check or attack roll. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Coral Saboteur
fields.description: As part of The Coral Bleachers, this rogue sea creature is well-versed in alchemical substances and uses them to sabotage and weaken Coralight's magical defenses. Wielding a sharp trident, they are sneaky and quick, often catching their enemies off guard.

actions.Trident Stab: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Cunning Action: As a bonus action, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

abilities.Sabotage: As an action, use a vial of alchemical substance to inflict disadvantage on an enemy's next attack roll. Usable 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you. Usable once per round.

fields.name: Mutated Marauder
fields.description: This adapted surface dweller has been transformed by the polluted waters of Coralight. With webbed feet and tentacles sprouting from their back, they are a formidable fighter who can swim and climb with ease. They are fiercely loyal to The Coral Bleachers, willing to do whatever it takes to protect their comrades.

actions.Tentacle Slam: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Swim Charge: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Climb: The Mutated Marauder can climb up to 30 ft as part of its movement without needing to make an ability check.

abilities.Corrupted Waters: As an action, the Mutated Marauder releases a burst of toxic water in a 15 ft radius. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution save or take 1d6 poison damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Loyal Defender: The Mutated Marauder gains a +2 bonus to AC while within 10 ft of an ally from The Coral Bleachers.

fields.name: Aurelia Glimmerscale
fields.description: Aurelia is a mermaid with shimmering silver scales and long, flowing blue hair. She is the leader of the Glimmerscale Traders, and her keen business sense and strategic mind have helped her build their extensive trading network. Despite her ruthless reputation in business dealings, Aurelia is fiercely loyal to her fellow traders and will do whatever it takes to protect them and their valuable wares.

actions.Rapier Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Charmer's Touch: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is charmed by Aurelia for 1 hour or until she or her allies harm the target. Aurelia can only have one creature charmed at a time. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Siren's Song: Aurelia can magically beguile creatures with her beautiful singing voice. As an action, she can choose any number of creatures within 30 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13). On a failed save, the creature is charmed and must use their action each turn to approach Aurelia, following her commands for 1 minute. Creatures can repeat the saving throw at the end of each turn, ending the effect early on a success. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Expertise (Persuasion): Aurelia has double proficiency in Persuasion checks, reflecting her silver tongue and ability to negotiate deals.
abilities.Bardic Inspiration: As a bonus action, Aurelia can grant an ally within 60 feet an inspiration die (1d6) to add to their ability check, attack roll, or saving throw. The ally can choose to use the die after they roll but before the DM announces the outcome. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Thorne Greybeard
fields.description: Thorne is a gruff dwarf who serves as the muscle for the Glimmerscale Traders. He may not have the silver tongue of his leader, but he makes up for it with his fierce strength and unwavering loyalty. Thorne often takes on dangerous missions on behalf of the trading network, using his size and strength to intimidate and protect his companions.

actions.Warhammer Swing: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Dragonborn Roar: As a bonus action, Thorne can let out a terrifying roar, causing all enemies within 15 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Indomitable: Thorne can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Kaida Silverfin
fields.description: Kaida is a merfolk with a knack for acquiring and selling rare magical items. She is known to be a bit of a wild card, but her expertise in all things magical makes her an invaluable member of the Glimmerscale Traders. Kaida is fiercely independent and always looking for the next big opportunity, much to the chagrin of her more cautious fellow traders.

actions.Rapier Thrust: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.

abilities.Smoke Bomb: As an action, create a cloud of smoke in a 10 ft radius. Creatures within the cloud are heavily obscured. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, when you have advantage on an attack roll or an enemy is within 5 ft. of you, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to the target. This increases to 4d6 at level 7 and 5d6 at level 15.
abilities.Mage Hand: As an action, create an invisible hand that can interact with objects within 30 ft of you. Usable at will.
abilities.Expertise: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with those skills.

fields.name: Rorik Seafoam
fields.description: Rorik is a young human who was rescued from a sinking ship by the Glimmerscale Traders. He has adapted well to life underwater and now serves as their resident expert in surface world goods. Rorik constantly seeks to prove his worth to the traders and is always looking for ways to increase their profits, often getting himself into trouble in the process.

actions.Rapier: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee/Range Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft./range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 6d6 damage to one creature if you have advantage on the attack roll or if they are within 5 ft. of an ally.

abilities.Underwater Invisibility: As an action, become invisible in water for 1 hour. Can only be used once per long rest.
abilities.Master Trader: Gain proficiency in persuasion and deception checks related to buying and selling goods. Can also double profits on successful persuasion rolls during trading encounters.

fields.name: Vexis Coralheart
fields.description: Vexis is a sentient sea serpent and member of the Glimmerscale Traders. Despite her fearsome appearance, she is actually quite friendly and serves as the group's boat captain. Vexis may not be the most talkative member of the trading network, but her loyalty and fierce protection of her companions make her an invaluable ally.

actions.Serpent Bite: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Tail Slap: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Siren's Song: As an action, Vexis can emit a haunting melody that charms all creatures within 30 feet. Affected creatures must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13) or be charmed for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Captain's Command: Vexis can use a bonus action to command her crew to take a specific action. This could include attack, defend, or repair the ship. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Endurance: Vexis has advantage on saving throws against exhaustion and can make a Constitution saving throw (DC 10) to negate any damage from lack of oxygen while underwater.

fields.name: Coral Protector
fields.description: This merfolk is fiercely protective of the vibrant coral city and its inhabitants. They use their sharp trident and lightning-fast swimming skills to ward off any threats.

actions.Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Coral Shield: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Coral Burst: As an action, create a burst of coral spikes in a 15 ft radius around the character. Each creature within the area must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 piercing damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Aquatic Vigor: As a bonus action, regain hit points equal to your paladin level. Once used, you must finish a long rest before using again. This ability cannot be used if you are not submerged in water.

fields.name: Glimmerscale Bodyguard
fields.description: This burly surface dweller has been hired by the Glimmerscale Traders to protect their trade routes and assets. Heavily armored and armed with a variety of weapons, including a magical sword, this bodyguard is a formidable force.

actions.Magical Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage plus 1d6 magical damage.
actions.Crossbow Shot: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Knockout Punch: As an action, make a melee attack with advantage against a target. If the attack hits, the target must make a Constitution saving throw or be knocked unconscious for 1 minute. This ability can only be used once per long rest.
abilities.Tactical Retreat: As a bonus action, you can disengage from a creature and move up to half your movement speed without provoking any attacks of opportunity. You can use this ability once per short rest.

fields.name: Kariel Seastrider
fields.description: Kariel is a mermaid from the Tide Whisperers faction who has spent most of her life studying the history and magic of the underwater city, Coralight. Her knowledge in these areas makes her a valuable asset to the party, providing insights and guidance in their adventures. Despite her scholarly demeanor, Kariel is also an adept fighter, using her sharp trident and mastery of water magic to defend her home and allies.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Trident Jab: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Tide's Gift: As a bonus action, Kariel can create a blast of seawater to knock an enemy prone within 30 ft. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Water Walk: Kariel can walk on any surface of water as if it were solid ground. Usable at will.
abilities.Sea's Protection: Kariel can call upon the power of the sea to grant herself or an ally within 30 ft temporary hit points equal to her cleric level. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Theron Deepseeker
fields.description: Theron is a member of the Tide Whisperers and a skilled marine biologist. He has spent years studying the diverse sea creatures that inhabit the waters of Coralight and has become an expert in identifying their behaviors and weaknesses. Theron's knowledge has proved valuable in battles, as he knows how to exploit his opponents' weaknesses. He also carries a unique set of tools and weapons, tailored specifically for underwater combat.

actions.Trident Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Net Throw: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 15/60 ft, one target. Hit: 0 bludgeoning damage and the target is restrained until the end of their next turn or until they escape the net (DC 13 Dexterity check).

abilities.Tide Shift: As a bonus action, Theron can shift into his sea elf form, gaining darkvision out to 60ft, underwater breathing, and a swim speed of 30ft. Lasts for 1 minute and can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Marine Biologist: Theron's extensive knowledge of sea creatures allows him to gain advantage on Nature and Survival checks related to underwater creatures.
abilities.Coralight Explosion: As an action, Theron can create an explosion of colorful light in a 20ft radius. All creatures in the area must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 13) or be blinded for 1 minute. Creatures that are immune to being blinded are instead stunned for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Ophelia Coralheart
fields.description: Ophelia is a mermaid healer and a core member of the Tide Whisperers. She uses her abilities to heal and regenerate wounded or sick sea creatures, as well as her allies. Ophelia is known for her calming presence and her intuitive understanding of the underwater world. She is also a fierce defender of Coralight and will not hesitate to use her water magic to protect her home and friends.

actions.Trident Strike: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage.
actions.Healing Wave: As an action, Ophelia can conjure a soothing wave of water, healing up to 3 creatures within 30 feet for 2d8 + 4 HP. Usable twice per long rest.

abilities.Water's Embrace: Ophelia can use an action to create a protective barrier of water around herself or an ally within 30 feet, granting a +2 bonus to AC for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sea's Blessing: As a bonus action, Ophelia can grant an ally within 30 feet temporary hit points equal to her level + her Wisdom modifier (3). Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Alder the Unfathomable
fields.description: Alder is a mysterious creature, believed to be a deep-sea dweller adapted to living in Coralight. He is a member of the Tide Whisperers, but his true origins remain a mystery. What is known about Alder is that he possesses a rare ability to communicate telepathically with sea creatures, making him an important part of the faction's research and exploration efforts. He is also a formidable fighter, using his control over water to create powerful waves and whirlpools.

actions.Scimitar: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 slashing damage.
actions.Call Lightning: As an action, call down a bolt of lightning to strike a point you can see within 120 feet. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d10 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Wild Shape: As a bonus action, transform into a beast form with a challenge rating equal to or less than 1. Usable twice per short rest.
abilities.Speak with Animals: As an action, speak telepathically with any sea creature within 30 feet. This ability can be used at will.

fields.name: Rielle Oceanbloom
fields.description: Rielle is a surface dweller who has found a home in Coralight as a member of the Tide Whisperers. Her fascination with the underwater world led her to join the faction and she quickly proved herself to be a valuable member. She is a skilled navigator and has an impressive understanding of the tides and currents. Rielle also possesses exceptional swordsmanship and is known for her fearless attitude in battle.

actions.Rapier Thrust: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a finesse or ranged weapon and have advantage on the attack roll, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to the target.
actions.Flourish: As a bonus action, you can choose to add your Charisma modifier to your attack roll or damage roll for a single attack. Can be used a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1), regains all uses after a long rest.

abilities.Ocean's Call: As an action, you can summon a wave of water to engulf your enemies. Each creature within 15 feet of you must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.

fields.name: Underwater Arcanist
fields.description: A merfolk mage with a deep understanding of the arcane power that flows through the ocean. Their spells are enhanced by the swirling currents and they can manipulate the water to their will.

actions.Arcane Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 force damage.
actions.Water Whip: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Tidal Surge: As an action, create a powerful wave of water that crashes down on enemies within a 20 ft radius, dealing 3d10 bludgeoning damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Aquatic Blessing: As a bonus action, grant a friendly target within 30 ft. temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier + your mage level. Can only be used twice per long rest.

fields.name: Coral Priest
fields.description: A humanoid figure covered in coral armor, they are a devout follower of the sea goddess and protector of Coralight. They can summon a tide of coral creatures to defend their city and heal any wounded citizens.

actions.Coral Spear: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.
actions.Coral Shield: As a reaction, the Coral Priest can summon a shield of coral to block an attack and gain +2 to AC for one round. Usable twice per long rest.
actions.Coral Swarm: As an action, the Coral Priest can summon a swarm of tiny coral creatures to attack one target within 20 ft. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 piercing damage. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Tide's Blessing: As a bonus action, the Coral Priest can heal a target within 15 ft by 1d6 + Wisdom modifier. Usable twice per short rest.
abilities.Coral Fortress: As an action, the Coral Priest can create a fortified structure of coral that provides cover and grants a +2 bonus to AC for all allies within 20 ft. Lasts for 1 hour or until destroyed. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Alarik Deepwater
fields.description: Alarik is a tall, muscular merman with deep blue scales and piercing green eyes. He is a leader among the Deepcurrent Carvers, highly skilled in carving intricate designs into coral structures and crafting beautiful jewelry from pearls and shells. He is respected for his talent and dedication to preserving undersea cultures through his work.

actions.Rapier Attack: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and target has disadvantage on its next attack roll.
actions.Healing Word: As a bonus action, choose a creature within 60 ft. that can hear you and restore 1d4 + 3 hit points.

abilities.Siren's Charm: As an action, you can use your charm and persuasion to lure a creature within 30 ft. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 16) or be charmed by you for 1 hour.
abilities.Heroic Inspiration: On your turn, you can inspire an ally within 60 ft. granting them a Bardic Inspiration die (1d8). Can only use once per short rest.

fields.name: Sarielle Tidecaller
fields.description: Sarielle is a young mermaid with a mischievous streak. Her long, flowing hair is the color of the ocean and she has sparkling, emerald green eyes. She is a skilled carver and often adds playful touches to her creations. She is beloved by her fellow Deepcurrent Carvers for her lively and creative spirit.

actions.Sword Strike: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Earworm: As a bonus action, you can choose a creature within 60 feet that can hear you and compel them to either move or take an action of your choice. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw with a DC of 13. On a failed save, the creature must comply with your command on their next turn. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Ocean's Lullaby: As an action, you can sing a soothing melody that puts creatures within 10 feet of you to sleep. Each creature within range must make a Wisdom saving throw with a DC of 13. On a failed save, the creature falls unconscious for 1 hour or until they take damage or someone uses an action to shake them awake. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Deepcurrent Inspiration: As a bonus action, you can grant a creature within 60 feet that can hear you an inspiration die (1d6). The creature can add the inspiration die to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw. The inspiration die expires after 1 hour. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Neriya Coralshaper
fields.description: Neriya is a master coralshaper, able to mold and manipulate the living coral around the city into stunning structures and functional items. She is a stoic and serious mermaid, with vibrant pink and purple scales and intense violet eyes. She is dedicated to the preservation of Coralight and its culture, and often takes on apprentice coralshapers to pass down her knowledge.

actions.Claw Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage.
actions.Bite Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Wild Shape: As an action, Neriya can transform into a brown bear or any other form she has seen. Usable twice per short rest.

abilities.Coral Sculpting: As a bonus action, Neriya can shape a piece of living coral within 5 feet of her into a functional item. The item can be used for 1 hour before returning to its original form. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Tidal Wave: As an action, Neriya can conjure a massive wave that crashes down on her enemies. Each creature within a 30 foot radius must make a Strength saving throw or take 4d8 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Half damage and no knockdown on a successful save. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Finnley Bluefin
fields.description: Finnley is a young, adventurous merman who left his small merfolk village to pursue his passion for crafting with the Deepcurrent Carvers. He has deep blue scales and piercing gray eyes. He is skilled in working with rare and exotic materials from the ocean depths, using them to create exquisite and unique pieces.

actions.Coral Dagger: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute.
actions.Ink Spray: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, range 30 ft., cone. Hit: 2d6 acid damage and the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

abilities.Ocean's Fury: As an action, summon a whirlpool in a 15 ft radius around you. Each creature within the whirlpool must make a Strength saving throw or take 2d8 bludgeoning damage and be restrained until the end of their next turn. This ability can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Master Artisan: Finnley has proficiency with artisan's tools and can create any non-magical item with a value of 50 gp or less in half the time and at half the cost.

fields.name: Lyra Pearlweaver
fields.description: Lyra is a half-elf who has adapted to life in Coralight, using her surface-dweller knowledge and skills to assist the Deepcurrent Carvers. She has long, curly auburn hair and bright blue eyes. She is a skilled weaver, incorporating the pearls and shells from the sea into her intricate tapestries and clothing designs. She is highly respected for her creativity and resourcefulness.

actions.Rapier attack: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Shortbow attack: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature if you have advantage on the attack roll or if the target is within 5 feet of an ally.
actions.Bardic Inspiration: As a bonus action, inspire an ally within 60 feet. They can add 1d8 to any ability check, attack roll, or saving throw within the next 10 minutes.

abilities.Pearlweaver's Mark: As an action, mark one creature within 30 feet. On your next hit against that creature, deal an extra 1d8 piercing damage.
abilities.Eternal Tide: Once per long rest, you can use a bonus action to gain temporary hit points equal to your rogue level + your Charisma modifier.
abilities.Song of the Sea: As an action, lull all creatures within 30 feet into a peaceful state. They must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Coral Warden
fields.description: This skilled merfolk guards the coral structures of Coralight with a fierce protectiveness, using their proficiency with a trident to fend off any attackers. They are well-respected for their dedication to preserving the city's beauty.

actions.Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Tail Slap: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Bioluminescent Weaver
fields.description: As a member of the Deepcurrent Carvers, this surface dweller has adapted to life in the undersea city and uses their magical abilities to create gorgeous woven tapestries from bioluminescent plants. Their creations are highly sought after and bring light and color to the dark depths.

actions.Wand Attack: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 force damage.
actions.Acid Spray: Cone of Acid: Each creature in a 15 ft cone must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 acid damage. Can only be used once per long rest.

abilities.Bioluminescent Weaving: As an action, create a 10 ft radius area of dim light that lasts for 1 hour. Any creature that enters this area must make a Wisdom save or be charmed for 1 minute. Can only be used once per short rest.
abilities.Mending: As an action, repair a broken object. Alternatively, can be used to heal a construct or object for 1d6 + Artificer level hit points. Can only be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Seraphine
fields.description: Seraphine is the leader of the Serene Guard, a skilled merfolk warrior with a fierce determination to protect Coralight. She commands respect and loyalty from her fellow guards, and is known for her quick thinking and bravery in battle. Raised in the depths of the ocean, Seraphine has a deep connection with the ocean and its creatures, giving her an advantage in combat.

actions.Divine Smite: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 radiant damage, or 2d8 + 4 radiant damage against undead or fiends.
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore hit points equal to 5 times your Paladin level. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Ocean's Blessing: As an action, call upon the powers of the ocean to bless yourself and your allies. All allies within 10 feet gain resistance to cold damage and can breathe underwater for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Aura of Protection: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet gain a bonus to all saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier (+4).
abilities.Aura of Courage: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet cannot be frightened while you are conscious.

fields.name: Kael
fields.description: Kael is a sea elf who joined the Serene Guard to put his skills as a hunter to good use. He is fiercely protective of his home and will stop at nothing to defend it. Kael is known for his sharp eyesight and stealthy movements, making him an excellent scout for the Serene Guard. However, his impulsive nature can sometimes lead him into dangerous situations.

actions.Longbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Dual Short Swords: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.

abilities.Eyes of the Sea: Kael has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight while underwater.
abilities.Fury of the Waves: As an action, Kael can unleash a surge of water in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 ft away. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Nature’s Shield: As a reaction, Kael can reduce damage taken from an attacker within 5 ft by 1d8 + his Wisdom modifier. He can use this ability a number of times equal to his Wisdom modifier (min. 1), regaining all uses after a long rest.

fields.name: Thalia
fields.description: Thalia is a member of the Serene Guard and a trusted advisor to Seraphine. She has a calming presence and is often the voice of reason during tense situations. Thalia is also skilled in magic, using her powers to heal and protect her fellow guards. She is deeply devoted to Coralight and will do whatever it takes to keep it safe.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 1 bludgeoning damage
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage, target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take full damage.

abilities.Healing Word: As a bonus action, heal a creature within 30 ft for 1d4 + 3 hit points. Usable twice per long rest.
abilities.Thaumaturgy: As an action, create minor magical effects such as changing the color of objects or creating sound. Has no specific limit of uses.

fields.name: Finn
fields.description: Finn is a surface dweller who has made Coralight his home. He joined the Serene Guard to repay the city for welcoming him with open arms. Finn is a skilled inventor and has created numerous gadgets and weapons to aid the Serene Guard in their mission. He brings a unique perspective to the group and is always eager to help in any way he can.

actions.Thunder Cannon: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 6 piercing damage.
actions.Volatile Concoction: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20 ft., area of effect 5 ft. radius. Hit: 2d6 fire damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Inventor's Insight: As a bonus action, you can choose to gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Explosive Mine: As an action, place a mine on the ground within 10 ft of you. The mine explodes when an enemy enters the space or after 1 minute, dealing 4d6 fire damage and setting the surrounding area on fire. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Artificer's Ire: As an action, you can imbue your weapon with magic, increasing its damage by 1d8 for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Coralight Armor: This magical armor provides an additional +2 bonus to AC and resistance to acid damage. It also allows the wearer to breathe underwater.

fields.name: Drago
fields.description: Drago is a sentient sea creature, a giant manta ray who has formed a bond with the Serene Guard. He serves as a scout and messenger for the group, using his keen senses and flight abilities to aid them in their missions. Drago is fiercely loyal to the Serene Guard and will do anything to protect Coralight, his adopted home.

actions.Stinger Sting: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 2d6 poison damage.
actions.Whirlwind: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/60 ft., multiple targets. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage. Can target up to 3 creatures in a 15 ft radius.

abilities.Manta Glide: As an action, Drago can use his large wingspan to glide up to 60 feet without needing to make a check for flight.
abilities.Sea Sense: Drago can use his keen senses to detect any hidden or invisible creatures within 30 ft as an action. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sea Telepathy: Drago can communicate telepathically with any willing creature within 120 ft. Usable at will.
abilities.Ocean's Protection: As a reaction, Drago can use his protective energy to block an incoming attack against himself or an ally within 30 ft. The attacker must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or the attack is redirected towards another target within range. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Coralight City Guard
fields.description: This merfolk guard is highly skilled in underwater combat, wielding a trident with incredible precision and speed. They are fiercely loyal to Coralight and will stop at nothing to protect their home and its inhabitants.

actions.Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Net Throw: Ranged Attack: +3 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: The target is restrained and can make a DC 12 Strength check to break free on each of its turns.

abilities.Water Shield: As a reaction, you can create a dome of water around you, granting you a +2 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Leviathan's Roar: As an action, you let out a powerful roar, causing enemies within 20 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they become frightened of you and must use their action to move away from you, if possible, on their turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Serene Shieldmaiden
fields.description: A sea elf warrior, this Shieldmaiden is known for her unwavering determination and her intricate knowledge of Coralight's defensive strategies. She strikes fear into any who dare to challenge the safety of her home and its people.

actions.Trident Thrust: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.
actions.Coral Spikes: As an action, summon spikes from the coral around the Shieldmaiden, causing 1d6 piercing damage to any creatures within 10 feet. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Water Breathing: The Shieldmaiden can breathe underwater indefinitely and has a swimming speed of 30 feet.
abilities.Coralight Blessing: As a bonus action, the Shieldmaiden can bless an ally within 30 feet, granting them temporary hit points equal to 1d6. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Leanda Morsa
fields.description: Leanda is a mermaid in her mid-twenties, with long flowing hair the color of coral and bright blue eyes. She is a skilled healer and is often seen swimming around Coralight, tending to injured sea creatures and merfolk. Despite the sadness and despair that surrounds her city, Leanda remains optimistic and dedicated to her duties, always looking for new ways to heal and protect her people.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Wave: As an action, Leanda can emit a healing wave that washes over her and all allies within 10 ft, restoring 2d8 hit points. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Blessing of the Sea: Leanda has a unique ability to bless the sea water around her, creating a calming and healing presence. Allies within 30 ft. gain advantage on Wisdom saving throws and regain 1d6 hit points at the start of their turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Kaila Rayne
fields.description: Kaila is a young human woman who was originally from the surface world but decided to make Coralight her home. She has short, curly brown hair and piercing green eyes. Kaila is a member of the Pearl Sentinels and uses her skills as a cleric to heal and protect her fellow citizens. She also has the unique ability to communicate with sea creatures, which often comes in handy during their missions.

actions.Mace Attack: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Bless: As an action, bless up to three creatures you can see within 30 ft. Each target gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Healing Word: As a bonus action, expend a spell slot to heal an ally within 60 ft for 1d4 + spellcasting modifier (Wisdom) hit points. Can be used a number of times equal to Wisdom modifier per long rest.
abilities.Water Breathing: As an action, touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to breathe underwater for 24 hours. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Tharion Coralbloom
fields.description: Tharion is a Triton and a skilled warrior, known for his bravery and strong leadership skills. He is the leader of the Pearl Sentinels and is highly respected by the members of the Healers Guild. The people of Coralight look up to him as a symbol of hope and strength in times of crisis. Tharion's golden hair and piercing blue eyes make him a striking figure among the underwater city's inhabitants.

actions.Spear Thrust: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, heal another creature for up to 25 hit points. Usable once per long rest.
actions.Divine Smite: As a bonus action, when hitting with a melee weapon attack, the paladin can expend a spell slot to deal extra radiant damage equal to the spell slot's level + 1d8.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and the target has disadvantage on its next attack.

abilities.Bless: As an action, bless up to three creatures within 30 ft. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or saving throw before the spell ends, the target can add a d4 to the roll. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Aura of Protection: At 6th level, the paladin and friendly creatures within 10 ft gain a +4 bonus to saving throws.
abilities.Song of Rest: As a bard, after a short rest, you can perform to soothe your allies. If you or any friendly creatures who can hear your performance regain hit points at the end of the short rest, each of those creatures regain an extra 1d6 hit points. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Neris Wavecaller
fields.description: Neris is a graceful sea elf with long, silver hair and pale blue eyes. She is a powerful druid who uses her magic to protect the city and its inhabitants from harm. Neris is also a member of the Pearl Sentinels, using her connection to nature to heal and support her allies. She is dedicated to preserving the natural beauty of Coralight and is always on the lookout for any signs of pollution or damage to the underwater environment.

actions.Quarterstaff: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Shillelagh (cantrip): Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you.

abilities.Nature's Wrath: As an action, you summon a wild storm of wind, rain, and lightning. Each creature within 10 feet of you must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d10 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Healing Touch: As an action, you can heal a creature within 5 feet of you for 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier (3) hit points. Can be used equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.
abilities.- Entangle (1st level): Creatures within a 20 ft square must make a Strength saving throw or become restrained in difficult terrain. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.- Moonbeam (2nd level): Creates a 5 ft radius cylinder of moonlight that damages any creatures in it. Can be moved each turn and lasts for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Finn Coralheart
fields.description: Finn is a young merman with bright red hair and deep green eyes. He is a member of the Healers Guild and specializes in potion-making. Finn's potions are highly sought after for their healing properties, and he often works closely with Leanda to create new and more effective remedies. Despite his quiet and reserved nature, Finn is a vital member of the Pearl Sentinels and uses his skills to protect and heal his fellow citizens.

actions.Potion Flask: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 healing.
actions.Acid Vial: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 acid damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage at the start of each of its turns for 1 minute.

abilities.Healing Touch: As a bonus action, you can heal a creature you touch for 1d6 + your Intelligence modifier. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier before needing a long rest.
abilities.Liquid Courage: As an action, you can give a creature within 30 ft of you advantage on their next saving throw. This ability can be used a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier before needing a long rest.

fields.name: Coral Adept
fields.description: A skilled healer and member of the Pearl Sentinels, Coral Adept uses their mastery of water magic to heal and protect others. They are known for their calming presence and endless patience.

actions.Mace: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Surge: As an action, Coral Adept can heal a creature within 30 ft for 1d8 + 5 hit points. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Water Shield: As a bonus action, Coral Adept can create a shield of water around themselves, adding +2 to their AC until the start of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Bio-Adapted Guardian
fields.description: This sentient sea creature is a skilled protector and member of the Pearl Sentinels. Their body is adorned with bioluminescent plants and they possess immense strength and agility in battle. They are fiercely loyal to their guild and will stop at nothing to defend their home.

actions.Unarmed Strike: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Quarterstaff: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Patient Defense: As a bonus action, the Bio-Adapted Guardian can spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action.

abilities.Bio-Adaptation: The Bio-Adapted Guardian can choose to have resistance to either acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage at the beginning of each turn. This resistance lasts until the end of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Seafolk's Insight: As an action, the Bio-Adapted Guardian can sense the presence and location of any enemy within a 30 ft radius. They also gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Insight) checks until the end of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Eirian
fields.description: Eirian is a mermaid of Coralight, with long, flowing dark blue hair and bright green eyes. She is a member of the Aquatic Alliance and serves as their leader, using her diplomatic skills and knowledge of Coralight's inhabitants to bring unity to the city. Despite her gentle appearance, Eirian is a fierce protector of her home and will do whatever it takes to keep it safe.

actions.Rapier Stab: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Siren's Lullaby: As an action, Eirian sings a haunting melody, forcing creatures within 30 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creatures are charmed and fall into a deep sleep. The sleep lasts for 1 minute or until the affected creature takes damage. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Aqua Blast: As an action, Eirian can create a blast of water in a 15-foot cone. Creatures within the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage. The damage increases by 1d6 for every level above 5th. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sea's Call: As a bonus action, Eirian can call upon the power of the sea, granting her and her allies within 30 feet temporary hit points equal to her bard level + her Charisma modifier. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Koral
fields.description: Koral is a young triton who has adapted to life in Coralight. With his vibrant red hair and deep blue eyes, he stands out among the other inhabitants of the city. Koral is the Aquatic Alliance's go-to for any underwater excursions, using his excellent swimming and combat skills to help protect the city from external threats. He is also an avid explorer and loves discovering new creatures and places in the ocean.

actions.Short Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Longbow Shot: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage.

abilities.Trident Strike: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 piercing damage. Can be used as a bonus action once per turn.
abilities.Aqua Shot: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 cold damage. Can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Fog Cloud: As an action, create a 20 ft radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The fog spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. The fog dissipates after 1 hour, or sooner if a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. Can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Cyra
fields.description: Cyra is a sentient sea creature, specifically a wise and ancient giant squid, who has been living in Coralight for hundreds of years. Though she is unable to speak in conventional terms, her intelligence and telepathic abilities make her a valuable member of the Aquatic Alliance. She uses her vast knowledge and experience to advise and guide the council in their decisions.

actions.Mind Blast: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 psychic damage and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for one round.
actions.Ink Cloud: As a bonus action, create a cloud of ink in a 15 ft radius. Creatures in the area are blinded until the end of their next turn.

abilities.Telepathy: Cyra can communicate telepathically with any creature within 120 ft.
abilities.Shape Water: As an action, Cyra can manipulate water within 30 ft, creating shapes or moving objects. Can be used 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Ocean's Blessing: Once per day, Cyra can bless a single ally within 30 ft. The ally gains temporary hit points equal to their level + Cyra's Wisdom modifier.

fields.name: Aiden
fields.description: Aiden is a surface dweller who has made Coralight his home. With his wild blonde hair and piercing blue eyes, he often stands out in the underwater city. As a skilled rogue, Aiden is a valuable member of the Aquatic Alliance, using his stealth and agility to gather information and complete covert missions for the council. However, his true loyalty lies with his closest friends and he will do anything to protect them.

actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an Attack if you have advantage on the Attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.

abilities.Invisibility: As an action, you can become invisible for up to 1 hour, until you attack or cast a spell, or if you leave concentration. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Evasion: When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Nereia
fields.description: Nereia is a beautiful sea elf who has lived in Coralight her entire life. With her pale skin, silver hair, and piercing green eyes, she embodies the beauty of the underwater city. Nereia is the Aquatic Alliance's healer and uses her magical abilities to aid wounded and sick inhabitants of Coralight. She is also a skilled warrior and will fight alongside her fellow council members to protect their home.

actions.Trident Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.
actions.Healing Word: As a bonus action, heal a creature within 60 ft for 1d4 + 4 hit points. Usable 3 times per long rest.

abilities.Sea's Blessing: Once per short rest, Nereia can call upon the power of the ocean to give her and her allies advantage on attack rolls for 1 minute.
abilities.Protective Aura: Nereia's mere presence on the battlefield provides a +2 bonus to AC for all allies within 10 ft. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Coralight Defender
fields.description: This loyal warrior is equipped with a sturdy trident and a suit of gleaming armor made from toughened coral. They patrol the city and its surrounding waters, defending it from enemy threats and potential dangers.

actions.Trident Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Net Throw: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 10 ft., one target. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained.

abilities.Coral Barrier: As a reaction, you can create a shield of coral to protect yourself or an ally within 10 feet. The shield lasts until the start of your next turn and adds +2 to AC. Usable twice per long rest.
abilities.Water's Blessing: You have advantage on all Dexterity saving throws while underwater.
abilities.Leadership: As a leader of the Coralight Defenders, you have the ability to inspire and motivate your fellow defenders in battle. Once per long rest, you can grant all allied creatures within 30 feet a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws for the next 1 minute.

fields.name: Bioluminescent Assassin
fields.description: This stealthy assassin specializes in navigating the dark alleys and tunnels of Coralight, taking out any threats to their home with ease. Their skin glows with a soft bioluminescent light, both a warning and an advantage in the depths.

actions.Dagger Thrust: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.
