actions.Poison Dart: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 poison damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour.

abilities.Blind Spot: As an action, the Bioluminescent Assassin can disappear into shadows and become invisible until their next turn. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Toxic Aura: Any creature within 5 feet of the Bioluminescent Assassin must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 2d4 poison damage at the start of their turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Zephyr Swiftfoot
fields.description: A fierce and cunning air genasi with a talent for piloting airships. Zephyr is the leader of the Stormfury Raiders, commanding their swift and deadly attacks on unsuspecting travelers in Aetheria's Reach. Though ruthless and ruthless in battle, Zephyr has a soft spot for his fellow air elementals, often allowing them to join the gang and find a sense of belonging.

actions.Cutlass Slash: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Pistol Shot: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 5 piercing damage.

abilities.Airship Maneuvering: Zephyr has proficiency with vehicles and can navigate an airship with expert precision, allowing the ship to move up to double its speed as a bonus action.
abilities.Airblast: As a bonus action, Zephyr can unleash a blast of air in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity save or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and be pushed back 10 feet.
abilities.Elemental Fury: Zephyr can channel his elemental fury to strike fear into his enemies. As an action, he can release a wave of elemental energy in a 30 ft sphere around him. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution save or take 2d8 thunder damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Stormcaller's Protection: Zephyr has a natural connection to air elementals and can call upon them for aid. As a reaction, he can summon a whirlwind to protect himself or an ally within 10 feet. The whirlwind grants resistance to all damage for 1 round. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Kiera Silversky
fields.description: A daring and adventurous half-elf, Kiera was once a member of a renowned skyship crew before being captured and forced to join the Stormfury Raiders. Despite her initial resentment, Kiera has come to embrace the thrill of piracy and loyalty to her new crew. She wields dual scimitars imbued with lightning magic, making her a formidable adversary in combat.

actions.Scimitar Slash: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 slashing damage plus 1d6 lightning damage.
actions.Lightning Lunge: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 lightning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet.

abilities.Storm's Fury: As an action, Kiera can summon a storm of lightning and rain, dealing 4d6 lightning damage to all creatures within 15 feet. She can use this ability once per long rest.
abilities.Evasion: If Kiera is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

fields.name: Magnus Stormcaller
fields.description: A burly and boisterous goliath with a fierce love for stormy weather. Magnus is the second-in-command of the Stormfury Raiders and their resident storm mage, calling down bolts of lightning to strike their enemies from above. Despite his rough exterior, Magnus is fiercely loyal to Zephyr and the rest of the gang.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 4d6 lightning damage. On a successful hit, the creature must also make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
actions.Stormcaller's Warhammer: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 bludgeoning damage plus 1d6 lightning damage.

abilities.Thunderous Bolt: As an action, Magnus can summon a powerful bolt of lightning to strike a single target. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d8 lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. Magnus can use this ability once per long rest.
abilities.Goliath's Resilience: Magnus has advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone or paralyzed.
abilities.Thundering Roar: As a bonus action, Magnus can release a deafening roar in a 15 ft. cone. Any enemy creatures in this cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn. Magnus can use this ability once per short rest.
abilities.Storm's Fury: Once per long rest, Magnus can use an action to call down a powerful storm in a 20 ft. radius around him. All enemies in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 4d10 lightning damage and be knocked prone. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not knocked prone.

fields.name: Aria Galeheart
fields.description: A graceful and elegant Aarakocra with a deep connection to the winds and skies of Aetheria's Reach. Aria left her secluded aerie to join the Stormfury Raiders, seeking adventure and excitement. She serves as the navigator and lookout for the gang, using her keen eyesight to spot potential targets and her aerial acrobatics to evade danger.

actions.Rapier: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or ranged weapon.

abilities.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a strong blast of wind that extends 60 feet in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Strength save or be pushed 15 feet away from you. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Evasive Maneuvers: As a bonus action, take the Dodge action and gain 5 feet of flying movement until the start of your next turn. Usable twice per short rest.

fields.name: Darian Stormblade
fields.description: A brash and hotheaded human with a burning desire for revenge against the wealthy elite of Aetheria's Reach. Darian joined the Stormfury Raiders after they rescued him from the clutches of a powerful noble who wronged him. He wields a magical rapier imbued with wind magic, channeling his anger and thirst for justice into each strike.

actions.Rapier Stab: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage plus 1d6 lightning damage.
actions.Wind Blade: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 slashing damage plus 1d4 thunder damage.
actions.Thunder Step: As an action, teleport up to 90 ft away and create a burst of thunderous energy. Each creature within 10 ft of you must make a Constitution saving throw or take 3d10 thunder damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Wind Cloak: As a bonus action, surround yourself in a cloak of swirling winds. Until the start of your next turn, you have resistance to piercing damage and you can move as if you were under the effects of the gust of wind spell. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll, or if the target is within 5 ft of an ally that isn't incapacitated and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

fields.name: Stormborn Firebrand
fields.description: A fierce and fearless sky pirate with bright red hair and a wild look in her eyes. Her ship is renowned for its speed and agility, and she wields her fire magic with deadly precision.

actions.Firebolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.
actions.Rapier Stab: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.

abilities.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a 60 ft line of strong wind that pushes creatures away. Each creature in the line must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Fiery Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft to an unoccupied space that you can see. Can only be used on the pirate's ship. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Tempest Thunderclap
fields.description: A hulking brute of an elemental, clad in a suit of lightning-imbued armor. He is the muscle and enforcer of the Stormfury Raiders, striking fear into their enemies with his booming thunderclap attacks.

actions.Thunder Punch: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d12 + 5 bludgeoning damage and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution save or be knocked prone.
actions.Lightning Strike: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 lightning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity save or be stunned for one round. Can be used 3 times per day.

abilities.Stormrage: As a bonus action, Tempest can rage and gains temporary hit points equal to her level + her Constitution modifier (4). She also gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws. Ends after 1 minute or until knocked unconscious.
abilities.Thunderclap: As an action, Tempest can release a deafening thunderclap in a 15 ft radius. Any creatures in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution save or take 2d6 thunder damage and be deafened for one round. Has 3 uses per day.

fields.name: Valdus Blackwood
fields.description: Valdus is a human warlock, born and raised within the ranks of The Void Cult. He is a charismatic and cunning leader, using his dark powers to sway others to the cause of the cult. Valus is fiercely loyal to the cult and will stop at nothing to see their prophecy fulfilled, even if it means sacrificing innocent lives.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 force damage.
actions.Baleful Thrust: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute.

abilities.Dark Pact: As a bonus action, you can expend a spell slot to gain temporary hit points equal to 5 times the level of the spell slot used.
abilities.Shadow Nova: As an action, release a burst of dark energy in a 15 ft radius. Each creature in the radius must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 necrotic damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Void Step: You can teleport up to 30 ft as a bonus action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

fields.name: Kaida Windwhisper
fields.description: Kaida is an air genasi rogue, infamous among the sky pirates for her unmatched speed and agility. She is a skilled thief and a master of deception, able to blend in with any crowd. Kaida has no loyalty to anyone but herself and will do whatever it takes to survive and gain power.

actions.Rapier Stab: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 6 piercing damage.
actions.Disengage: As a bonus action, you can take the Disengage action.

abilities.Lightning Crash: As an action, create a small storm cloud above an enemy within 60 ft. The enemy must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 lightning damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Evasion: When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw.
abilities.Uncanny Dodge: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you.

fields.name: Marcus Stormborn
fields.description: Marcus is a half-elf paladin, devoted to protecting the people of Aetheria's Reach and keeping the Void Cult at bay. He is a strong and just leader, known for his unwavering determination and sense of justice. Marcus will stop at nothing to bring down the cult and save the Skyborne Archipelago from its impending doom.

actions.Longsword: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage plus 1d8 radiant damage.
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore 15 HP, divided as you choose among any number of creatures within 5 feet of you. Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest before you can use it again.

abilities.Divine Smite: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal an extra 2d8 radiant damage to the target, plus 1d8 for each spell slot higher than 1st. Usable twice per short rest.
abilities.Aura of Protection: While conscious, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you gain a +3 bonus to all saving throws.

fields.name: Lyra Nightshade
fields.description: Lyra is a tiefling bard, renowned for her enchanting voice and mesmerizing performances. She uses her talents to spread her own agenda, often using her skills for thievery and manipulation. Lyra may come off as charming and alluring, but her true motives are always shrouded in mystery.

actions.Rapier Thrust: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Blinding Dart: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 radiant damage and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn.

abilities.Charismatic Performance: As an action, use your bardic performance to charm a humanoid creature within 30 ft. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Illusory Magic: As an action, create an illusion in a 15 ft cube within 60 ft. Creatures that interact with the illusion must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or realize it is an illusion. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Ga'Rothar Shadowcaller
fields.description: Ga'Rothar is a dragonborn cleric, once a devoted member of The Void Cult but now turned against them. He was tricked into joining by false promises of power, but soon realized the true evil and corruption within the cult. Ga'Rothar uses his divine powers to fight against the cult and seek redemption for his past actions.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Divine Channel: As an action, channel your divine energy to restore 2d8 hit points to yourself or an ally within 30 ft. Can be used a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once) per long rest.
abilities.Divine Wrath: As a bonus action, expend a spell slot to add 2d8 radiant damage to your next weapon attack. Can be used a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once) per long rest.
abilities.Rebuke the Void: As an action, force all enemies within 10 ft of you to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they take 2d6 radiant damage and are blinded until the end of their next turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Void Harbinger
fields.description: The Void Harbinger is a powerful cultist who has undergone dark rituals to imbue themselves with the power of the void. They are capable of summoning tendrils of darkness and casting destructive spells to aid the cult in their quest to bring about the end of Aetheria's Reach.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 force damage.
actions.Tendril Whip: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 piercing damage and the target must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be grappled.

abilities.Dark Summoning: As an action, summon a shadowy creature to aid in battle. The creature has a CR of 2 and obeys the cultist's commands. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Dark Aura: As an action, the cultist can unleash a wave of darkness in a 15 ft radius. Creatures within the radius must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 necrotic damage. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Shadow Assassin
fields.description: The Shadow Assassin is a stealthy member of the cult, trained in the art of assassination. They are skilled with a variety of weapons, but their preferred method of killing is using poison and darkness to take out enemies silently and efficiently.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Poison Dart: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 poison damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour.

abilities.Shadow Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 60 ft to a space in dim light or darkness that you can see. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Smoke Bomb: As an action, create a 10 ft radius sphere of darkness centered on yourself. All creatures within the sphere are heavily obscured. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Keira Skyblaze
fields.description: Keira is a fierce and determined leader of the Skybreaker Legion. She is a skilled swordswoman, known for her swift and precise strikes in battle. Her fiery red hair and piercing blue eyes add to her intimidating presence. Keira is cunning and strategic, always thinking one step ahead of her enemies.

actions.Longsword Slash: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8+4 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4+4 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Strategic Planning: As a bonus action, Keira can analyze her surroundings and plan her attack, granting her advantage on her next attack roll.
abilities.Leadership: Keira's presence on the battlefield inspires her allies. She and all allied creatures within 10 feet gain a +2 bonus to their attack rolls and saving throws.
abilities.Battle Fury: Once per short rest, Keira can enter a state of battle fury, granting her an extra attack and advantage on all attack rolls for the duration of one minute. She also gains resistance to all damage during this time.

fields.name: Darrin Thunderstrike
fields.description: Darrin is a high-ranking member of the Skybreaker Legion, known for his lightning-fast reflexes and lightning magic. He is often seen leading small strike teams on covert missions. Darrin is fiercely loyal to Keira and will stop at nothing to achieve her goals.

actions.Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 6 slashing damage.
actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.

abilities.Lightning Strike: As an action, channel your inner magic to strike lightning at a target within 60 ft. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Can be used 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Dragon's Breath: As an action, unleash a 15 ft cone of lightning from your mouth. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Eira Nightstorm
fields.description: Eira is the chief healer of the Skybreaker Legion. She is a master of elemental magic, able to heal her allies and harm her enemies with the elements at her disposal. Eira is kind and gentle, but she will not hesitate to use her magic to protect her friends and comrades.

actions.Mace Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.

abilities.Healing Burst: As a bonus action, heal up to six allies within 30 ft for 2d8 + Wisdom modifier. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Elemental Blast: As an action, unleash a blast of elemental energy in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in the cone must make a Dexterity save or take 2d6 cold, fire, or lightning damage (choose one). Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Marcus Steelheart
fields.description: Marcus is the chief engineer of the Skybreaker Legion, responsible for creating and maintaining their advanced weaponry and airships. He is a skilled inventor and strategist, always looking for ways to improve their military technology. Marcus is a stoic and no-nonsense individual, but he deeply cares for his fellow soldiers.

actions.Rifle Shot: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Turret Deployment: As an action, deploy a turret that assists with combat. It has 18 HP and can make a ranged attack with a +5 to hit, dealing 1d8 + 3 piercing damage. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Bombardment: Once per long rest, use an action to call in a strike from the Skybreaker's air fleet. Every creature within a 20 ft. radius must make a Dexterity save or take 3d10 fire damage, half damage on a success.
abilities.Inventor's Mind: As an action, you can create a makeshift device to assist in any task. Roll a d20 and add your Intelligence modifier. On a roll of 13 or higher, the device is successful. Can be used a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1) per long rest.

fields.name: Lyra Sunfire
fields.description: Lyra is a young and talented mage, eager to prove herself in battle. She has a strong sense of justice and is not afraid to speak her mind, often clashing with Keira's more ruthless tactics. Lyra's magic focuses on harnessing the power of the sun, making her a formidable opponent in battle.

actions.Scorching Ray: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 fire damage.
actions.Guiding Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 4d6 radiant damage and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of your next turn has advantage.

abilities.Sunburst: As an action, create a burst of sunlight in a 20 ft radius. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or take 3d6 radiant damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Sun Shield: As a reaction, you can surround yourself with a shield of sunlight, gaining resistance to fire damage until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Aetherial Sky Pirate
fields.description: This air elemental has been corrupted by the lure of treasure, becoming a fierce marauder of the skies. Armed with a cutlass and a bag full of magical trinkets, the Aetherial Sky Pirate strikes fear into the hearts of their victims with reckless abandon.

actions.Cutlass Slash: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Wind Gust: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away.

abilities.Galeforce: As a bonus action, the Aetherial Sky Pirate can use their elemental powers to control the winds, giving them advantage on all ranged attacks until the end of their next turn. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Treasure Hunter: When the Aetherial Sky Pirate defeats an enemy, they can search their body and find a magical trinket worth 15 gold pieces. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Arcane Skybreaker Mage
fields.description: This human mage is a master of arcane knowledge and has been extensively trained in aerial combat. They wield a powerful staff imbued with the essence of the Sky Isles, allowing them to control the elements and cast powerful spells from the safety of their airship.

actions.Staff Strike: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Elemental Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 force damage.

abilities.Sky Isles' Fury: As an action, summon a storm of magical energy from the Sky Isles, dealing 3d6 lightning damage to all creatures within 10ft. Once per long rest.
abilities.Aerial Escape: As a reaction, use your knowledge of aerial combat to escape an enemy's attack. Add 2 to your AC for that attack. Usable twice per long rest.

fields.name: Talia Whisperfoot
fields.description: Talia is a halfling rogue with a mischievous streak and a quick wit. Her small stature belies her sharp mind and fierce determination. Having grown up in the aerial city of Aetheria's Reach, she navigates the floating islands with ease and knows all the secret passages and hidden treasures. She wears a leather hooded cloak and carries a pair of magical daggers.

actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage to one creature if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or ranged weapon.

abilities.Shadow Step: As an action, you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see dim light or darkness. You can use this feature twice and regain expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.
abilities.Thieves' Cant: You can speak, read, and write Thieves' Cant, a secret language used among criminals. You also have access to hidden symbols and phrases used to convey messages without being understood by others.

fields.name: Kalden Greymane
fields.description: Kalden is a human sorcerer with a knack for tinkering with ancient technology. He is a member of the Windborne Guild and uses his magical abilities to power their airships and weapons. With striking silver hair and piercing blue eyes, he commands respect and fear from his enemies. He wears a long coat made of a special fabric that allows him to glide through the air.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.
actions.Chromatic Orb: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 3d8 damage of a type of your choice (acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder).

abilities.Arcane Augmentation: As an action, Kalden can temporarily boost the power of an airship or weapon by infusing it with magic. This grants it +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 minute. Usable 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Technological Disruption: Kalden can use his magical abilities to disrupt any nearby technology, disabling it or causing it to malfunction. This can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Windstride: Kalden can use his technological coat to gently glide through the air, allowing him to move up to 30 ft. horizontally or 10 ft. vertically as a bonus action. This can be used once per turn.

fields.name: Silviana Nightwhisper
fields.description: Silviana is an elven ranger and the leader of a group of rebels fighting against the oppression of the Windborne Guild. She is skilled with a bow and has a deep connection to the elements. Her silver hair is adorned with feathers and she wears a mask made of leaves to protect her identity. Her loyalty lies with her people and she will do anything to protect them.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Ensnaring Strike: 1st level spell, as an action, make a ranged weapon attack. On a hit, target takes an additional 1d6 piercing damage and must make a Strength saving throw or be restrained. Usable once per turn.

abilities.Nature's Blessing: As a bonus action, choose one of the following effects:
abilities.Elemental Infusion: You can imbue your ranged weapon with the power of a chosen element once per turn. Choose from fire, ice, or lightning. The next damage dealt with your weapon will deal an extra 1d6 of that chosen element's damage.

fields.name: Darius Ironfist
fields.description: Darius is a dwarf artificer and a member of the Windborne Guild. With his broad build and bushy beard, he looks like a typical dwarf. But his true strength lies in his mechanical inventions and his keen mind for strategy. He is always tinkering with new gadgets and weapons to give his allies an edge in battle. His loyalty to the guild runs deep, but he is always open to new business opportunities.

actions.Thunder Cannon Blast: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Hammer Strike: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 bludgeoning damage.

abilities.Ace Up Your Sleeve: As a bonus action, choose one of your Artificer Infusions. You can use that infusion without expending a spell slot. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Mechanical Servant: As an action, summon a small mechanical servant to aid you in battle. It has 10 HP and can attack with a small crossbow for 1d6 damage. Lasts for 1 hour or until dismissed. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Lyra Nightingale
fields.description: Lyra is a tiefling bard and a member of a traveling theatrical troupe. Her mesmerizing performances and charming personality have made her beloved by many, but few know of her sharp tongue and quick hands. She uses her skills not only to entertain, but also to gather information for her troupe's next heist. She wears flashy clothes and carries a lute made of black wood that she plays with unmatched skill.

actions.Rapier: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

abilities.Countercharm: As an action, you can use your music or words to disrupt mind-influencing effects within 30 feet of you. Affected creatures have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Prestidigitation: As a minor action, you can create harmless sensory effects, such as a puff of smoke, a spark, or a noise. Usable at will.
abilities.Song of Rest: As a bonus action when you or any friendly creatures who can hear your music regains hit points, they regain an extra 1d6 hit points. This increases to 1d8 at 9th level and 1d10 at 13th level. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Skyblade Assassin
fields.description: A fierce and agile warrior, skilled in the art of assassination and mastery of the skies.

actions.Dagger Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Vanish: As an action, become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack or use another ability. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Wings of Fury: The Skyblade Assassin can fly up to their movement speed as a bonus action. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Poisoned Blade: The Skyblade Assassin can apply a coating of poison to their daggers, allowing them to deal an additional 2d4 poison damage on their next successful attack. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Arcane Tinkerer
fields.description: A brilliant inventor and member of the Windborne Guild, armed with a range of magical gadgets and devices.

actions.Electric Shock Glove: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 lightning damage and the target must make a Constitution save or be stunned for 1 round.
actions.Explosive Bomb: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 fire damage and the target and all creatures within 5 ft. must make a Dexterity save or take an additional 1d4 fire damage.

abilities.Teleportation Boots: As an action, the Arcane Tinkerer can teleport up to 30 ft. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Force Field Generator: As a reaction, the Arcane Tinkerer can create a protective force field around themselves, granting a +4 bonus to AC until the start of their next turn. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Althea Swiftwing
fields.description: Daughter of a sky pirate and a high elf scholar, Althea is a fierce and ambitious member of the Celestine Scholars. She is known for her quick thinking and lightning-fast reflexes while navigating the treacherous sky currents of Aetheria's Reach. With a deep curiosity for ancient magic, Althea seeks to uncover the secrets of the archipelago and its floating islands.

actions.Shortsword: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 force damage.

abilities.Quick Step: As a bonus action, Althea can use her quick reflexes to evade an attack, adding +5 to her AC until the start of her next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Skyfall: Althea can cast Feather Fall at will, allowing her to safely navigate falls from any height.
abilities.Arcane Eye: As an action, Althea can summon a magical eye to scout out areas or peek around corners. The eye has 30 ft. of darkvision and can be moved up to 30 ft. per round. Lasts for up to 1 hour or until dismissed. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Felix Thunderblade
fields.description: An air genasi with a natural affinity for lightning, Felix is a seasoned adventurer who joined the Celestine Scholars in hopes of uncovering the mysteries of Aetheria's Reach. His lightning-infused sword, Thunderblade, is a rare and powerful artifact said to have been forged by the gods themselves. Felix is known for his brave and daring demeanor, often leading dangerous expeditions to explore the uncharted islands.

actions.Thunderbolt Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 lightning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away.
actions.Wind Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

abilities.Thunderwave: As an action, unleash a wave of thunderous force in a 15 ft cube originating from you. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw or take 2d8 thunder damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Unending Breath: You can hold your breath indefinitely and have advantage on saves against gas and poison.

fields.name: Lirien Lightweaver
fields.description: A skilled wizard and member of the Celestine Scholars, Lirien is known for her vast knowledge of ancient magic and her ability to manipulate light. With her trusty griffin companion by her side, Lirien is often seen flying through the skies of Aetheria's Reach, conducting experiments and research on the magic that keeps the islands afloat. Though she may seem reserved and serious, Lirien has a mischievous side that often leads her into dangerous situations.

actions.Magic Missile: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 3d4 + 3 force damage.
actions.Chromatic Orb: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 3d8 damage of a type determined by a d8 roll (1 - Acid, 2 - Cold, 3 - Fire, 4 - Force, 5 - Lightning, 6 - Poison, 7 - Psychic, 8 - Thunder).

abilities.Lightweaving: As a bonus action, Lirien can create a 15 ft radius of bright light around herself, granting her advantage on Dexterity saving throws while in the light. This ability can be used twice per long rest.
abilities.Windrider: Using her griffin's assistance, Lirien can use her reaction to avoid an attack or spell that would normally hit with an AC of 16 or lower. This ability can be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Caspian Stormcaller
fields.description: As a tempest cleric and member of the Celestine Scholars, Caspian uses his divine magic to protect and guide his fellow scholars on their expeditions. With his powerful storms and fierce winds, Caspian is able to navigate through the chaotic weather of Aetheria's Reach with ease. He is also a skilled healer, often putting himself in harm's way to protect his allies.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Wrath of the Storm: When a creature within 5 feet of you that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to deal lightning or thunder damage to the attacker. The damage is equal to 1d8 + your Wisdom modifier, once per long rest.
abilities.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a strong gust of wind that affects creatures in a 60-foot line. Creatures that fail a Strength save are pushed 15 feet away from you. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Healing Word: As a bonus action, you can heal a creature you can see within 60 feet for 1d4 + your cleric level hit points. Usable twice per short rest.

fields.name: Nova Starlight
fields.description: A tiefling sorcerer, Nova is the leader of the Celestine Scholars and a renowned expert on the history and culture of the archipelago. She is known for her stunning appearance and charismatic personality, often using her charm and wit to get what she wants. Despite her glamorous exterior, Nova is a highly intelligent and powerful sorcerer, constantly seeking to uncover the secrets of Aetheria's Reach.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.

abilities.Celestial Charm: As an action, charm one humanoid creature within 30 ft. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Nova for 1 hour or until she or her allies harm the target. This ability can only be used once per long rest.
abilities.Teleportation: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft. away to an unoccupied space that you can see within 120 ft. This ability can only be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Winged Blade Dancer
fields.description: This graceful elf has mastered the art of fighting with dual swords while flying through the air, making her a formidable opponent to anyone who crosses her path.

actions.Dual Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Flying Strike: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 6 piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.Gale Gust: As an action, unleash a gust of wind in a 20 ft cone. Each creature in the cone must make a Strength save or be pushed 10 feet away. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Sneak Attack: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to add 2d6 damage to your attack roll if you have advantage on the attack, or if an enemy is within 5 feet of you.
abilities.Evasion: You can use your reaction to take no damage from a Dexterity saving throw that you would normally take half damage from. Usable once per turn.

fields.name: Arcane Elementalist
fields.description: A master of the elements, this human has harnessed the power of the sky and controls lightning and wind with ease. Their knowledge of magic makes them a valuable asset in any fight.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 lightning damage.
actions.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a 60 ft long blast of wind. Each creature in the line must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 ft away from you. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Elemental Shield: As a reaction, create a shield of elemental energy that adds +2 to your AC against one attack. Usable once per round.
abilities.Storm's Fury: As an action, summon a storm cloud above you. All creatures within 10 ft must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 lightning damage. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Xanthia Thistledown
fields.description: Xanthia Thistledown is a carefree halfling rogue from the Cloudweaver Collective. With her acrobatic skills and sharp wit, she is their go-to for scouting and thievery missions. Despite her mischievous tendencies, she truly believes in the Collective's values and will fiercely defend her fellow artisans.

actions.Dagger Stab: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Shortbow Shot: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 5 piercing damage.
actions.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 3d6 damage when you hit a target with a weapon attack and have advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally who isn't incapacitated.

abilities.Cloudweaver's Cloak: As an action, you can magically transform into a cloud of mist that lasts for 1 hour or until you drop concentration. In this form, you have a flying speed of 30 ft. and can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. You can also enter and occupy the space of another creature, but if you end your turn there, you take 3d6 force damage.
abilities.Evasive Maneuvers: As a bonus action, you can take the Dodge action to increase your AC by 2 until the start of your next turn. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

fields.name: Alaric Skystrider
fields.description: Alaric Skystrider is a noble and charismatic human bard from the Cloudweaver Collective. He uses his storytelling and musical talents to entertain and inspire his community, bringing joy and unity to the collective. When conflicts arise, he is the one who uses his charms to negotiate and find peaceful resolutions.

actions.Rapier Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Vicious Mockery: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d4 psychic damage and target has disadvantage on next attack roll. Usable 3 times per long rest.

abilities.Song of Rest: As a bonus action, you can inspire your allies to regain extra hit points when they spend hit dice during a short rest. Each ally who can hear you regains an extra 1d6 hit points.
abilities.Charm Person: As an action, you can attempt to charm a humanoid within 30 ft. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for 1 hour.
abilities.Cloudweaver's Blessing: You have advantage on all Charisma and Persuasion checks when interacting with members of the Cloudweaver Collective. You also have resistance to lightning damage.

fields.name: Selene Cloudweaver
fields.description: Selene Cloudweaver is a wise and serene tiefling sorcerer from the Cloudweaver Collective. She is one of the founding members and holds great knowledge of ancient elemental magic, which she uses to create and maintain the floating islands. Despite her age, she remains active in the community, always willing to offer her guidance and wisdom.

actions.Eldritch Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 force damage.
actions.Chaos Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 random damage type.

abilities.Elemental Mastery: As an action, Selene can tap into the elemental magic of the Cloudweaver Collective, granting her resistance to the corresponding elemental damage for 1 hour. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Touch of the Void: Once per short rest, Selene can use her sorcery points to unleash a burst of void energy around her, dealing 2d6 necrotic damage to all creatures within 10 ft radius. The damage increases by 1d6 for every 2 sorcery points spent.

fields.name: Roran Stoneheart
fields.description: Roran Stoneheart is a strong and stoic dwarf fighter from the Cloudweaver Collective. He is the leader of their defense force and takes his role very seriously. His loyalty to the Collective and his determination to keep their home safe has earned him great respect and admiration from his fellow artisans.

actions.Battleaxe Swing: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Block: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 bludgeoning damage. If the target is attacking an ally within 5 feet of you, they deal half damage and you take no damage instead.

abilities.Mountain's Resilience: As a bonus action, you can gain resistance to one damage type until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Commander's Inspiration: As an action, you can use your voice to inspire your allies, giving them advantage on their next attack roll. Can only be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Kiara Windwhisperer
fields.description: Kiara Windwhisperer is a curious and adventurous half-elf ranger from the Cloudweaver Collective. She is always seeking new challenges and discoveries, often venturing out beyond the floating islands. Her bond with nature and her sharp archery skills make her an invaluable asset for the defense of the Collective's home.

actions.Longbow: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft, one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Fey Step: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this ability twice and regain all expended uses after finishing a short or long rest.
abilities.Nature's Veil: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
abilities.Calm Emotions: As an action, you can suppress strong emotions in a group of creatures within 20 feet of you that you can see. Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target is charmed for the duration of the spell (up to 1 hour). This ability can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Skyborne Architect
fields.description: This skilled artisan from The Cloudweaver Collective is adept at creating intricate structures and buildings from the very clouds themselves. With an eye for detail and a creative spirit, they bring wonder and beauty to the floating islands of Aetheria's Reach.

actions.Cloudstrike: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 lightning damage.
actions.Cloudstep: The Skyborne Architect can use their air elemental abilities to quickly move 30 ft as a bonus action.

abilities.Cloudform: As an action, the Skyborne Architect can transform into a cloud for up to 1 hour, gaining resistance to non-magical damage and the ability to fly. Once used, this ability can only be used again after a long rest.
abilities.Dimensional Pocket: The Skyborne Architect can create a pocket of air within a 5 ft radius that can store up to 500 pounds of objects. The pocket lasts for 1 hour or until dismissed by the Architect. This ability can be used again after a short rest.

fields.name: Stormcaller
fields.description: As an air elemental shaman, this member of The Cloudweaver Collective is deeply connected to the skies and the forces of nature. They can call upon powerful storms and use their air magic to protect and defend their fellow artisans from any threat that may arise.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 lightning damage.
actions.Call Winds: As an action, create strong winds in a 20 ft radius centered on self. Creatures within the radius must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 ft. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Storm's Fury: As a bonus action, call forth a powerful storm to surround yourself. You gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage and any creatures within 5 ft of you take 1d6 lightning damage at the start of each of their turns. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Elemental Shield: As a reaction, create a swirling shield of air to protect yourself or an ally within 10 ft. The shield grants a +2 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Kael'thas Morningstar
fields.description: As a member of the Azure Sentinels, Kael'thas Morningstar has dedicated himself to protect Aetheria's Reach and its inhabitants from any threats. Standing at 6'2" with a muscular build and striking blue eyes, he is an imposing figure clad in gleaming plate armor with the emblem of the order emblazoned on his chest. With his noble demeanor and impressive combat skills, Kael'thas is a strong leader and a force to be reckoned with in battle.

actions.Divine Smite: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 radiant damage plus 1d8 for each spell slot used above 1st (maximum 5d8).
actions.Lay on Hands: As an action, you can touch a creature and restore hit points equal to 5 times your paladin level. You can also use this action to cure one disease or neutralize one poison affecting the creature.

abilities.Aura of Protection: As a bonus action, you can grant yourself and all friendly creatures within 10 feet a bonus of +2 to their saving throws.
abilities.Divine Sense: As an action, you can detect good and evil creatures within 60 feet, as well as consecrated or desecrated places for up to 10 minutes. You can use this feature 3 times per long rest.

fields.name: Lyra Windweaver
fields.description: Lyra Windweaver is a skilled air elemental and member of the Azure Sentinels. She has long, flowing silver hair and piercing green eyes, and is often seen wearing a simple yet elegant dress made of swirling air currents. Her abilities allow her to manipulate wind and storms, making her a valuable asset to the order. Lyra is kind and compassionate, always willing to lend a helping hand to those in need.

actions.Wind Whip: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 feet.
actions.Thunder Strike: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 lightning damage.

abilities.Storm Surge: As an action, summon a powerful storm within a 20 ft radius. All creatures within the storm must make a Dexterity save or take 3d6 thunder damage and be knocked prone. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Lightning Bolt: As an action, call down a bolt of lightning from the sky. All creatures in a 10 ft wide, 60 ft long line must make a Dexterity save or take 4d6 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Usable twice per long rest.
abilities.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a strong gust of wind in a 60 ft long, 10 ft wide line. All creatures in the line must make a Strength save or be pushed 15 feet away. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Garrick Stormreaver
fields.description: Garrick Stormreaver is a half-elf sky pirate and member of the Azure Sentinels. With his charming grin and mischievous nature, he is both a skilled fighter and a cunning strategist. He wields two finely crafted cutlasses and is often seen perched on his trusty griffin mount, soaring through the skies. Despite his rough exterior, Garrick values honor and loyalty above all else.

actions.Dual Cutlass Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 slashing damage.
actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Sky Strike: As an action, Garrick can leap up to 30 ft and make a Dual Cutlass Strike attack against a target, dealing an additional 1d8 piercing damage. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Grappling Hook: Garrick can attempt to grapple a target within 20 ft as a bonus action. On a success, he can pull the target towards him or move towards the target without provoking opportunity attacks.
abilities.Sentinel's Gambit: Once per long rest, Garrick can take an additional action during his turn. This action can only be used to attack or use an ability. If he takes this extra action, he gains disadvantage on all attacks and ability checks until the start of his next turn.
abilities.Note: Garrick's Half-Elf race grants him an additional ability score increase, which he uses to increase his Dexterity to 16.

fields.name: Sylviel Farsight
fields.description: As an elven sorceress and member of the Azure Sentinels, Sylviel Farsight is a powerful wielder of magic. With long, flowing blonde hair and piercing blue eyes, she commands an air of grace and elegance. She is skilled in both offensive and defensive magic, making her a valuable addition to the order's ranks. Sylviel is fiercely independent and always stands by her morals.

actions.Fire Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 fire damage.
actions.Ray of Frost: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 cold damage and the target's speed is reduced by 10 ft until the start of your next turn.

abilities.Charm Person: As an action, attempt to charm a humanoid within 30 ft. The target must make a Wisdom save or be charmed by you for 1 hour or until it takes damage. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Misty Step: As a bonus action, teleport up to 30 ft to an unoccupied space that you can see. Can be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Torin Stonemaul
fields.description: Torin Stonemaul is a sturdy dwarf and member of the Azure Sentinels. With his thick beard and stocky build, he is a formidable opponent in battle. Torin is a master of heavy armor and wields a hammer imbued with the power of lightning. Despite his gruff exterior, he has a big heart and is fiercely dedicated to protecting his comrades and the archipelago.

actions.Thundering Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 4 bludgeoning damage, plus 2d6 lightning damage.
actions.Shield Block: Reaction: When hit by a melee attack, use your shield to increase AC by 2 until the start of your next turn.

abilities.Storm of Vengeance: As an action, create a storm cloud that hovers over a point within 60 feet for up to 10 minutes. When a creature enters the cloud or starts its turn there, it must make a Dexterity save or take 2d8 lightning damage. On each of your turns, you can use an action to make the cloud strike again. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Indomitable: Once per long rest, you can reroll a saving throw that you fail. You must use the new roll.

fields.name: Skyborne Ranger
fields.description: These skilled archers are trained to navigate the unpredictable winds and heights of the Skyborne Archipelago. They are swift and precise, and will stop at nothing to protect their home.

actions.Longbow Attack: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger Throw: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 piercing damage.
actions.Multiattack: The Skyborne Ranger can make two attacks in a turn, using either Longbow or Dagger Throw.

abilities.Wind Step: As a bonus action, the Skyborne Ranger can use their air genasi abilities to move up to their movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Gust of Wind: As an action, the Skyborne Ranger can unleash a powerful gust of wind in a 60 ft line. Each creature in the line must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed back 15 feet and knocked prone. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Skyborne Fury: When attacking from a higher elevation, the Skyborne Ranger deals an additional 1d6 damage on successful hits. This ability is always active while in the Skyborne Archipelago.

fields.name: Stormcaller Mage
fields.description: With mastery over the elements, these powerful spellcasters can control the very storm clouds that surround the archipelago. They are fiercely loyal to The Azure Sentinels and will use their powers to defend their comrades.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 lightning damage.
actions.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a line of strong wind 60 ft. long and 10 ft. wide. Each creature within the line must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you. Usable once per long rest.

abilities.Storm Shield: As a reaction, create a shield of wind around yourself or an ally within 30 ft. The target gains a +3 bonus to AC until the start of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.
abilities.Thunderous Step: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 60 ft. to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

fields.name: Aurius The Wise
fields.description: Aurius is a tall and lanky air genasi with piercing blue eyes that seem to reflect the ever-changing skies above. He is the leader of the Zephyr Alliance and a master of diplomacy. His calm demeanor and vast knowledge make him a respected mediator among the island leaders. His abilities to control and manipulate air make him a formidable ally and a fearsome enemy.

actions.Gust Strike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 bludgeoning damage and the target must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet.
actions.Wind Whirl: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 20 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 slashing damage and the target must make a Dexterity saving throw or be pushed 10 feet.

abilities.Whirlwind Waltz: As a bonus action, Aurius can create a 15 ft whirlwind around himself. Any creature within the whirlwind must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and be pushed 10 feet away from Aurius. Aurius can maintain this whirlwind for up to 1 minute or until he is incapacitated. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Melodic Aura: Aurius can use his Bardic Inspiration to give 1d6 bonus to any ally's attack or saving throw that is within 30 ft of him. Usable twice per long rest.
abilities.Calm Mind: Aurius has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.
abilities.Charm Person: Aurius can use his Charm Person ability once per long rest. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is charmed by Aurius and will do his bidding for up to 1 hour.

fields.name: Vexis Blackwind
fields.description: Vexis is a reckless and daring sky pirate with a wild mane of curly red hair and a devil-may-care attitude. She is a force of nature, both in personality and in her elemental powers as a descendant of the legendary storm giants. Despite her chaotic nature, she has pledged her loyalty to the Zephyr Alliance, always ready to lend her skills in aerial combat to protect the archipelago.

actions.Storm Whip: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 + 3 lightning damage.
actions.Wind Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 2 force damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft away.

abilities.Tempestuous Magic: As a bonus action, you can use your stormy nature to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.
abilities.Call Lightning: As an action, you can summon a bolt of lightning to strike a target within 120 ft. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d10 lightning damage, half damage on a success. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Elemental Control: As an action, you can choose one area of air, water, fire, or earth within 30 ft and control it, shaping it to your will. You can use this ability once per short rest.

fields.name: Lyra Celeste
fields.description: Lyra is a kind and compassionate aasimar, known for her healing abilities and her unwavering devotion to the Zephyr Alliance's cause. Her wings are a shimmering gold, marking her as a celestial being in the eyes of those who meet her. She assists in the organization of diplomatic meetings and defense preparations, always putting the well-being of others before her own.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged spell attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Hands: As a bonus action, touch a creature and restore hit points equal to your Cleric level. Can be used a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
abilities.Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn: As an action, emit a wave of radiant energy. Undead and fiends within 30 ft must make a Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 + 5 radiant damage, or half damage on a success. Can be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Cassius Stormward
fields.description: Cassius is a powerful and ambitious human wizard, with a keen interest in the elemental powers of the archipelago. He is a master of storm magic and is constantly seeking new ways to harness the power of the Aetheria's Reach for his own gain. Despite his questionable methods, the Zephyr Alliance values his knowledge and aid in protecting their home.

actions.Arcane Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 force damage.
actions.Thunderwave: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 15 ft., all creatures in a 15 ft cube originating from you. Hit: 4d8 thunder damage and must succeed on a DC 14 Strength save or be pushed 10 ft away.

abilities.Storm's Fury: As an action, create a tempestuous storm in a 20 ft radius within 60 ft of you, dealing 4d6 lightning damage to all creatures in the area. Additionally, any creature that starts its turn in the area takes 2d6 lightning damage. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Aetheric Shield: As a reaction, create a shield of swirling Aetheric energy around you, granting +5 to your AC until the start of your next turn. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Talia Skyheart
fields.description: Talia is a fierce and determined half-elf ranger, with a deep connection to the creatures of the sky. She has an uncanny ability to communicate with air elementals and uses them to scout and gather information for the Zephyr Alliance. Her hardened exterior hides her true passion for protecting her home and the inhabitants of Aetheria's Reach.

actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 piercing damage.

abilities.Windsong: As an action, call upon the wind to guide your attacks. Your next attack gains a +2 bonus to hit and deals an extra 1d8 force damage.
abilities.Animal Messenger: Through your connection with the air elementals, you can send a message to a friendly creature within 100 ft. The message must be 25 words or less and the creature must have an Intelligence score of 2 or higher. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Airborne Scout
fields.description: This sharp-eyed scout uses a combination of gliding with their wings and levitation magic to traverse the islands at a rapid pace, gathering information and warning the Zephyr Alliance of any potential threats.

actions.Claw Attack: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 slashing damage.
actions.Feather Dart: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 piercing damage.

abilities.Wind Rider: As a bonus action, the scout can activate their wings and glide for up to 60 feet without falling. They must land at the end of the turn or fall.
abilities.Hawk Vision: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
abilities.Levitation Magic: The scout can use their levitation magic to reduce any fall damage they take by half. Additionally, they can cast Feather Fall once per long rest.
abilities.Zephyr's Blessing: As a reaction, the scout can imbue their weapon with wind magic, giving it a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Tempest Mage
fields.description: This powerful mage wields the winds and storms of Aetheria's Reach as their own for the defense of the Zephyr Alliance. They can summon lightning bolts, create gusts of wind to push back enemies, and even fly using their mastery of the air.

actions.Lightning Bolt: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 3 lightning damage.
actions.Gust of Wind: As an action, create a 60 ft line of strong wind that pushes creatures 15 ft away. Creatures that fail a Strength save are pushed twice the distance and knocked prone. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Flight: As an action, this character can fly for up to 10 minutes. After that, they fall to the ground unless they can land on a solid surface. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Storm Shield: As a reaction, this character can create an elemental shield that gives them resistance to lightning damage for one round. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Magna
fields.description: Magna is a proud and strong air elemental who is fiercely loyal to the Lumina Healers faction. She wields powerful healing magic and uses her agility to support her comrades in battle. Despite her intimidating appearance, Magna has a kind and gentle heart, always putting the needs of others before her own.

actions.Unarmed Strike: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Ki-Empowered Strikes: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 magical bludgeoning damage.
actions.Healing Touch: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature. Hit: Target regains 2d8 + 4 hit points.

abilities.Air Step: As a bonus action, you can dash or disengage, and can move through nonmagical difficult terrain without slowing your movement. Usable once per turn.
abilities.Breath of Life: As an action, you can heal all creatures within a 30 ft radius for 2d8 + Wisdom modifier hit points. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Cleansing Aura: As an action, you can create a 10 ft radius aura that removes all status effects and grants resistance to necrotic damage for all allies within it. Usable once per long rest.

fields.name: Lyra
fields.description: Lyra is a young and enthusiastic sky pirate who has recently joined forces with the Lumina Healers. She may be inexperienced, but she makes up for it with her quick thinking, sharp aim, and daring stunts on her airship. Lyra is always up for an adventure and loves exploring the unknown territories of the Skyborne Archipelago.

actions.Longbow Shot: Ranged Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 piercing damage.
actions.Arcane Shot: As a bonus action, imbue your arrow with magical energy. Make a ranged weapon attack with your bow. On a hit, the target takes an extra 2d6 force damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you. Usable twice per short rest.

abilities.Skyglide: As an action, Lyra can use her airship to glide above the battlefield, granting her a flying speed of 40 feet for 1 minute. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Healing Touch: Once per short rest, Lyra can use her knowledge of healing herbs and magic to heal an ally for 2d8 + her Wisdom modifier in hit points.
abilities.Note of Lumina: Lyra has a special bond with her airship, the Lumina, and can communicate with it telepathically. The Lumina also provides her with advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks while on board.

fields.name: Zephyr
fields.description: Zephyr is a seasoned adventurer who has been traveling alongside the Lumina Healers for years. He is a skilled swordsman and uses his magic to enhance his attacks. Zephyr is known for his unwavering bravery and unwavering sense of justice. He always stands up for what is right and will do whatever it takes to protect his friends.

actions.Sword Slash: Melee Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 6 slashing damage.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 6 bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Burning Blade: As an action, imbue your sword with flames. Your sword attacks deal an additional 1d6 fire damage for 1 minute. Usable once per short rest.

abilities.Radiant Aura: As a bonus action, you can emit a 10 ft aura of radiant energy. Allies within the aura gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1) at the start of each of their turns, as long as you are conscious. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Empowered Strikes: Your attacks ignore damage resistance and immunity to non-magical attacks. This counts as magical damage.

fields.name: Veda
fields.description: Veda is a highly respected healer within the Lumina Healers. She has mastered the art of healing and has a deep understanding of the mysteries of light magic. Veda is also a wise and patient mentor, always willing to share her knowledge with those in need. She is a key member of the faction and plays a crucial role in their journey.

actions.Mace Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.

abilities.Healing Touch: As an action, the character can heal a creature within 5ft for 1d8 + 8 hit points. Usable 3 times per long rest.
abilities.Turn Undead: As an action, the character presents their holy symbol and all undead within 30 ft must make a Wisdom saving throw. If failed, they are turned for 1 minute or until they take damage. Can be used once per short/long rest.
abilities.Lumina's Grace: As a bonus action, the character can imbue an ally within 30 ft with a radiant glow, granting them a +2 bonus to their next attack roll or saving throw. Usable once per short rest.

fields.name: Garrick
fields.description: Garrick is the leader of the Lumina Healers and the one responsible for bringing the group together. He is a powerful light mage and a skilled tactician, knowing when to use his magic and when to rely on his comrades' skills. Garrick is a natural leader, inspiring loyalty and respect in his team, and always leading by example. He will stop at nothing to protect the Aetheria's Reach and the people who call it home.

actions.Divine Blast: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 radiant damage.
actions.Healing Touch: Melee touch spell: +6 to hit, one target. Hit: Creature regains 2d8 + 5 hit points.

abilities.Blinding Flash: As an action, create a burst of blinding light in a 15 ft radius. Each creature within must make a Constitution save or be blinded for 1 round. Can be used once per short rest.
abilities.Leader's Mark: As a bonus action, mark a target within 30 ft. Ally attacks against the marked target have advantage. Can be used once per long rest.

fields.name: Winged Sylph
fields.description: With graceful wings and glowing skin, the Winged Sylph glides effortlessly through the air, spreading healing light wherever they go.

actions.Mace Spike: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 bludgeoning damage.
actions.Healing Touch: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 radiant damage and target regains 1d8 + 4 hit points.

abilities.Wings of Light: As a bonus action, gain a flying speed of 30 ft for 1 hour. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Hymn of Healing: As an action, all allies within 15 ft regain 1d8 + 4 hit points. Can be used once per long rest.
abilities.Blessing of the Sylph: As a reaction, grant an ally within 30 ft a +2 bonus to AC for 1 minute. Can be used once per short rest.

fields.name: Seraphic Healer
fields.description: This celestial being radiates pure light, using their powers to heal any ailment and restore balance to their allies.

actions.Sacred Flame: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 radiant damage.
actions.Healing Word: Bonus Action. Range 60 ft. Up to 6 creatures regain 1d8 + 3 hit points.

abilities.Celestial Radiance: As an action, the Seraphic Healer can release a burst of healing energy in a 20 ft radius. All allies within the area regain 2d6 hit points. Usable once per long rest.
abilities.Angelic Shield: As a reaction, the Seraphic Healer can teleport to a space within 10 ft of an ally and grant them a +2 bonus to AC until the end of their next turn. Usable once per short rest.
